name: Psionic Theory
description: The mind is in many ways a reflection of the universe itself, a microcosmos. Not all beings will reach this level of insight, but their minds are tools greater than any other.

unlock_details.description: Bypass: Tunnel | Faction Type: Traditionalist | Trait: Trait Expertise Psionics

name: Mote Stabilization
description: Volatile Motes are fickle particles that are dangerous to work with. In order to safely harvest them without setting off a chain-reaction of explosions, energy fields must be used to stabilize the motes.

unlock_details.description: Observation Mission: Observation | Strategic Resource: Motes | Tradable Action: Action Prospectorium Technology

name: Exotic Gas Extraction
description: Pockets of Exotic Gas are rare and often inaccessible by conventional means. Such deposits can only be reached by using special extractor technology.

unlock_details.description: Observation Mission: Observation | Strategic Resource: Gases | Tradable Action: Action Prospectorium Technology

name: Rare Crystal Mining
description: Mining these crystals without damaging or even destroying them is an extremely delicate process. It requires advanced equipment capable of pinpoint precision.

unlock_details.description: Observation Mission: Observation | Strategic Resource: Crystals | Tradable Action: Action Prospectorium Technology

name: Living Metal
description: Mining and processing the rare living metals is exceedingly difficult, but successful application of the mutable alloys yields incomparable advantages.

unlock_details.description: Strategic Resource: Living Metal | Tradable Action: Action Prospectorium Technology

name: Zro Distillation
description: $tech_mine_zro_desc.1$ $ORGANIC_INGESTED$ $tech_mine_zro_desc.2$ $individuals_key$$tech_mine_zro_desc.3$ $ORGANIC_DRUG$ $tech_mine_zro_desc.4$

unlock_details.description: Anomaly: Zro Ice Cat | Tradable Action: Action Prospectorium Technology

name: Dark Matter Drawing
description: This exotic substance has many properties that seemingly defy the laws of physics. Harvestable concentrations can only be found near Black Holes or in certain nebulas.

unlock_details.description: Government/Civic: Corporate Dark Consortium | Tradable Action: Action Prospectorium Technology

name: Mega-Engineering
description: To complete construction projects of truly staggering scales we must first achieve a fundamental understanding of both the engineering and resource storage requirements for such megastructures.

name: tech_synthetic_leaders
description: Equipped with a personality, synthetics will finally be able to interact socially on equal terms with the rest of our citizens. Some units may even assume leadership roles.

name: Selected Lineages
description: Careful reproductive planning should be incentivized, lest we waste valuable genetic legacies.

unlock_details.description: Faction Types: Progressive, Totalitarian, Institute | Policy: leader_enhancement_natural_selection

name: Capacity Boosters
description: We leave nothing to chance, no matter the cost. Through exacting curation of DNA banks do we build the leaders of tomorrow.

name: Ground Defense Planning
description: There are many alien empires who would gladly seize our worlds for themselves. We must be prepared for them, should the worst come to pass.

name: Weather Control Systems
description: The ability to alter a planet's weather patterns to suppress destructive weather phenomena will make residential buildings easier to maintain and open up new areas for habitation.

name: Anti-Gravity Engineering
description: With directional gravity technology, buildings on the surface of planets can reach higher than ever before without risking structural collapse. The sky is the limit!

name: Agrarian Utopias
description: Through the establishment of weather-controlled rural communes, we can support a larger population without disrupting our agrarian way of life.

name: Numistic Data Modeling
description: Are the precognitive powers of Numa at work or is it a matter of skilled craftsmanship? Either way this galactic stock market prediction model will forecast fluctuations in the economy with divine accuracy.

name: Machine Template System
description: Standardization of assembly templates allows for improved specialization of the machine population.

name: Machine Template System
description: Rewritable assembly templates allow for the creation of bespoke robot designs.

name: Climate Restoration
description: By advancing our understanding of atmospheric transformation, we will be able to terraform even the most ecologically devastated worlds.

name: $building_bio_reactor$
description: $building_bio_reactor_desc$

name: Rare Crystal Manufacturing
description: The crystallization process is complicated and difficult, but synthetic crystals can be manufactured by using specialized industrial plants.

name: Exotic Gas Refining
description: Exotic Gas can be produced artificially, but it is a difficult process that requires advanced refinery equipment.

name: Volatile Material Plants
description: Aside from the obvious safety concerns, the artificial creation of Volatile Motes is an extremely delicate and complicated process that requires highly specialized equipment.

name: New Horizons
description: New Horizons

name: Mechanized Mining
description: The application of mechanical engineering to mineral extraction is a fundamental requirement for any industrial society.

name: Industrial Agriculture
description: Large-scale industrial farms growing nutrient-rich produce allows a civilization to grow its population manifold.

name: Penal Colonies
description: Through the development of special penal worlds, criminals can be rehabilitated through honest, hard labor. Some may be in need of permanent rehabilitation.

name: Thrall-Worlds
description: Through the creation of special slave-breeding worlds, we can ensure that we will always have a steady supply of disposable laborers.

name: Resort Worlds
description: With careful study devoted to landscaping and the science of fun, the construction of entire worlds dedicated to leisure can be made possible.

name: Planetary Resurfacing
description: With the advent of clean fusion, automation, and matter compression technologies, it was only a matter of time before mountain top removal became mountain range removal.

name: Deep Crust Engineering
description: Advances in material technology and deep-shaft mining techniques allow geo-engineering at previously unthinkable depths and temperatures. Magma hotspots can now be exploited, suppressed, or even relocated.

name: Dangerous Wildlife Removal
description: Tactical disruption of natural habitats combined with converging search-and-destroy patterns can effectively eliminate hostile wildlife in a very short span of time.

name: Selective Defoliants
description: Thorough cataloging, gene sequencing, and computer modeling of exobotanical ecosystems, coupled with gene editing and dispersal mechanisms, will allow us to reshape alien plant communities to our liking.

name: Ocean Ecology Management
description: Given enough processing power, networked sensors and distributed stations, even the ocean currents can be managed to a fine level of control.

name: Subterranean Colonization
description: Many planets exhibit extensive subsurface voids. Subterranean exploration, exploitation, and construction techniques can greatly increase the habitable area of some worlds.

name: Soil Remediation
description: The process of soil deposition normally takes millions of years. With advanced fracking, chemical engineering, and hydraulic management technologies even the poorest substrate can be turned into fertile topsoil.

name: Xeno-Hydraulic Mastery
description: Sapient races have been reclaiming swampland for thousands of years. A coordinated system of modular aqueducts, pump stations, chemical remediation crawlers and automated soil compactors can reclaim land at unprecedented speeds.

name: Climate Control Network
description: Orbital systems of mirrors and shades can effect dramatic changes in planetary climates, when managed properly.

name: Transwarp Flag
description: Test Only - should not be seen

name: Raven Class Refit
description: The Aerie vessels are used for a variety of purposes, including service as surveyors and colony ships in both Starfleet and civilian service.

name: Core Cracking
description: $PLANET_KILLER_CRACKER_DESC$

name: Dreadnaught Planet Killer Section
description: Unlocks the Planet Killer section for large battleships for players with DLC.

name: Cosmic Storm Defense
description: This is the practice of altering weather to prevent or cause damaging weather events and ensuring that our environments are protected.

name: Cosmic Storm Defense II
description: Advancements in the practice of altering weather to prevent or cause damaging weather events and ensuring that our environments are protected.

name: Duranium Plating
description: Duranium is an extremely strong metal alloy that is used by many species for starship hulls due to its suitability as armour.

name: Deep Space Construction
description: Advances in construction technology allow our stations to be built with more redundancy and with the most up-to-date technology onboard.

name: Large Scale Space Manufacturing
description: Our engineering projects continue to grow, not only in scope, but in size as well. As a result we begin to better understand the design challenges on what we are constructing in space.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Country Limits: Space Stations Limit, Starbase Nor Limit | Megastructures: Borg Catapult 1, Deep Space Station, NAME_deep_space_9, Nor Class Installation, Space Station Upgrade Stage 1, Space Station Upgrade Stage 2, Hyper Relay, Orbital Defense Grid, Orbital Battery Upgrade, Federation Recycle 01, Romulan Recycle 01, Klingon Recycle 01, Dominion Recycle 01, Cardassian Recycle 01, Generic Recycle 01, Borg Recycle 01, Undine Recycle 01, Research Starbase, Research Starbase, NAME_shipyard_earth_1 | Policy: policy_traffic_control_enabled | Ship Types: Starhold, Space Starbase, Starbase Nor, Cannon, Starbase | Tradable Action: Action Bulwark Technology

name: Large Scale Infrastructure Construction
description: The manufacturing requirements for objects of the size and reliability needed for large scale space projects will require research.

name: Planetary Scale Construction
description: Construction in space presents our engineers with new design challenges that must be solved before we can build orbital stations above other worlds.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Megastructures: Borg Catapult 2, Federation Recycle 02, Romulan Recycle 02, Klingon Recycle 02, Dominion Recycle 02, Cardassian Recycle 02, Generic Recycle 02, Borg Recycle 02, Undine Recycle 02 | Ship Type: Starfortress | Tradable Action: Action Bulwark Technology

name: Planetary Scale Construction
description: Construction in space presents our Engineers with new design challenges that must be solved before we can build orbital stations above other worlds.

name: Mega-Engineering
description: Our engineering expertise has finally advanced to the point at which we have begun to harness the power of entire star systems. The ability to build true mega-structures, such as those theorised by scientist Freeman Dyson in the mid-20th century, is now within our grasp.

name: Solar-Scale Construction
description: Utilising all the resources of a solar system requires planning into navigational routes, orbital bodies and logistical planning.

name: Galactic-Scale Construction
description: As our reach grows ever larger throughout the galaxy, new projects to take advantage of new construction techniques utilising the latest technologies can be created.

name: Advanced Construction Methods
description: Advancements in starbase construction bring new methods of building deep space stations. Modular systems and more readily available resources mean that starbases can be constructed more readily.

name: Orbital Station Commercial Zoning
description: By potentially introducing areas where commerce can take place, we can defray the cost of construction into the private sector.

name: Standardised Construction Workbee
description: Standardisation of cargo modules and interfaces allows a standardised workbee to be constructed. This allows rapid deployment of hull panels and ensures standardised plating with no weak points.

name: Advanced Starbase Construction Methods
description: While buildings like space elevators and skyhooks have existed for some time in one form or another, now we can look into the application of these kind of mega structures on the government level. Either for transport or defence may these buildings serve as the pinnacle masterpieces of our constructions efforts.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Megastructure: Borg Catapult 3 | Ship Type: Citadel | Tradable Action: Action Bulwark Technology

name: Large Scale Shipyards
description: The largest and most powerful vessels that we estimate to be used within our arsenal will require a much more complex and advanced shipyard.

name: Civilian Infrastructure
description: Research into improvements for civilian infrastructure is of vital importance to a growing empire. The more civilian population behind our efforts, the more rapid our expansion and exploitation of resources can be.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship, Custom | Ship Types: Science, Constructor

name: Starship Construction (Beam Weapons)
description: As warp travel starts to become an established technology, many new starship designs will need to be created to exploit its potential. The Starship-Class of primary hull, armed with beam weapon ports and torpedo launchers, represents our first attempt at designing a general-purpose starship. As we gain experience with space travel and combat, new roles within our fleets will open up.

name: Starship Construction (Cannon Weapons)
description: The invention of the warp drive opens up new possibilities for our civilisation, both peaceful and violent. The Bird-of-Prey class of vessel will allow us to bring powerful cannons to bear on any who dare violate our space. They will project the strength and fury of our hearts upon the homes of our enemies. In time we will need to conceive larger and specialised ships to maintain our dominance.

name: Cell Ship Reinforced Interlocks
description: The modular nature of the Cell ships allows for the joining of many vessels into one. For more static structures, we should investigate reinforcing the interlocks to ensure full structural integrity.

unlock_details.description: Decisions: Expand Suliban Helix Botanical 1, Expand Suliban Helix Mining 1, Expand Suliban Helix Energy 1, Expand Suliban Helix Research 1, Expand Suliban Helix Trade 1, Expand Suliban Helix Industry 1, Expand Suliban Helix Expansion 1

name: Helix Diffusion Algorithm
description: The shifting nature of the Helix has many external pressures and forces thrust against it, requiring new algorithms to manage the power flow across large amounts of modular cell ships.

unlock_details.description: Decisions: Expand Suliban Helix Botanical 2, Expand Suliban Helix Mining 2, Expand Suliban Helix Energy 2, Expand Suliban Helix Research 2, Expand Suliban Helix Trade 2, Expand Suliban Helix Industry 2, Expand Suliban Helix Expansion 2

name: Advanced Modular Station Designs
description: As the Helix grows, new designs are required in order to ensure structural integrity of the whole is kept strong.

unlock_details.description: Decisions: Expand Suliban Helix Botanical 3, Expand Suliban Helix Mining 3, Expand Suliban Helix Energy 3, Expand Suliban Helix Research 3, Expand Suliban Helix Trade 3, Expand Suliban Helix Industry 3, Expand Suliban Helix Expansion 3

name: Conquering the Dark
description: The optimisation of all systems within the Helix allows it to grow to an extremely large size.

unlock_details.description: Decisions: Expand Suliban Helix Botanical 4, Expand Suliban Helix Mining 4, Expand Suliban Helix Energy 4, Expand Suliban Helix Research 4, Expand Suliban Helix Trade 4, Expand Suliban Helix Industry 4, Expand Suliban Helix Expansion 4

name: Geocentric Orbit Construction
description: Orbital satellites around a planetary body allow for a criss-crossing network that can cover the entire surface.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Type: Station Small

name: Traffic Command
description: The sublight navigational hazards of objects and other spacecraft in inhabited systems often require traffic control.

name: Modular Space Engineering
description: Prefabricated offsite construction allows for improved station engineering.

name: Braving the Dark
description: As colonies expand further into the darkness, more and more bureaucracy is required to keep the logistical problems at bay.

name: Inner Solar Defense Perimeter
description: Processes for platforms guarding the approaches to low planetary orbits without interfering with planetary traffic.

name: Observing the Dark
description: Strange, weird, and wonderful sights come from the darkness of space. We should investigate ways of ensuring the borders are secure and monitoring signals from the deep black.

name: Central Structural Integrity Field
description: An object in space is subject to immense velocities, micro-collisions, and extreme temperature variances. Appropriate reinforcement technology can help relieve these stresses.

name: Heavy Weapon Platform
description: These massive defensive outposts provide extensive protection against enemy incursion, and serve to deter less enthusiastic adversaries from nefarious behavior.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Type: Station Large

name: Outer Solar Defense Perimeter
description: Processes for platforms guarding the approaches far away from any planetary orbits without interfering with planetary traffic departing or arriving into the system.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Starbase Buildings: Grid, Hull Integrity Ii

name: Heat Recyclers
description: Waste heat energy can be recycled throughout all the systems onboard, allowing for increased efficiency

name: Synapses Interceptors
description: Potentially more powerful cybernetic implants could be installed into biological beings in order to increase their cognition and motor functions.

name: Synchronised Firing Patterns
description: Cross-linking weapon systems to fire in staggered volleys improves the actual damage output of Military Stations over time.

name: Intergalactic Expansion
description: The continued expansion of our starbases across the stars requires abundant resources and research to ensure our empire can maintain its control over large distances.

name: Repurposed Civilian Courier Ships
description: Small courier ships used by the civilian fleet for communications and dispatches have provided us with incremental improvements that we could use on our own strike craft.

name: Engineering Corps
description: The creation of a dedicated naval engineering corps will greatly benefit the construction of deep space defense platforms, decreasing building costs and increasing durability.

name: Static Defense Optimisation
description: The main disadvantage to a military station is that it cannot move. We can, however, turn this into an advantage for our onboard weapon systems by routing more power through the primary transfer buffer coils and allowing targeting arrays to pick targets independently of the main systems.

name: Fortified Core Layers
description: Additional layers of armor plating within the structure itself improve the resilience of Military Stations.

name: Unimatrix Defense Grid
description: Designed to offer full targeting capabilities across a wide spectrum, the defense grid is a powerful deterrent.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Type: Unimatrix Defense Small

name: Dimensional Breach Anchored Defenses
description: Creation of static defenses that do not travel with the currents of fluidic space has been a challenge. A potential solution is a breached anchor, ensuring the defences remain static.

name: Privatised Trade Stations
description: Privately-owned trading stations offer the ability for private citizens from across the galaxy to meet and trade with each other.

name: Private Enterprise
description: Outsourcing the creation of new mining and research stations to the private sector allows for their own resources to be used in bolstering the stations defensive systems.

name: Mobile Air Defenses
description: Hidden hangars could be located across our planets containing sub orbital fighters that are capable of engaging invading troops.

name: XCV Tech
description: Originally built as a Starliner, a manned interstellar probe from the United Earth Space Probe Agency, as one of Earth's earliest attempts at interstellar travel. It was the only class to reach its destination of Alpha Centauri before being phased out.

name: Flagships
description: The pinnacle of our technologies should be incorporated into a vessel that can act as the flagship of our fleet.

unlock_details.description: Megastructures: Sphere 1, Sphere 2, Sphere 3, Sphere 4, Archive 0 | Ship Types: Juggernaut, Colossus, Battlecruiser, Lightship, Raider, Destroyer, Cruiser, Ent Fleet Museum, Ent Naval Museum, Seleya, Kumari, Sirena, Station, One, Cannon, Dy100, Station, Science Station, Science Station, Science Station, Starbase | Strategic Resources: Zro, Dark Matter, Nanites, Threads, Biomass, Insight, Crystals

name: Destroyers
description: While larger than Corvettes, Destroyer hull configurations still make for comparatively nimble gunboats.

name: Cruisers
description: Originally devised as an experimental next-generation colony ship hull configuration, the design's ample hardpoints made it ideal for carrying heavy weapons ordnance.

name: Battleships
description: The largest of the standard military vessels, Battleships are traditionally heavily armored and sport several gun batteries.

name: Titans
description: Designing ships at this scale allows for a deadly combination of exceptional firepower and cutting-edge auxiliary support. Titan configurations may serve as highly versatile flagships which are also capable of bolstering surrounding vessels or ensnaring hostiles.

unlock_details.description: Country Limit: Ships Limit | Ship Type: Titan

name: Transorbital Fighters
description: Designed to operate with a base of operation close by, these transorbital fighters could be used to harass enemy ships.

name: Mass-Scale Nanobot Reconstruction
description: Instead of using the mobile depot units, that some of our deep space stations have installed within their stations, to help repair other friendly ships near them, we can convert our nanobot technology instead to replicate this same feature. With the highly advanced nature of our nanobots, they will also be able to assist in restoring shields faster as well.

name: Space Superiority Fighters
description: Advances in fighter technology mean that the next step is well equipped for both dogfighting and anti-capital operations, dedicated fighters that can pack a punch.

name: Elite Fighters
description: Research has been undertaken to design small strikecraft that can take on small starships by themselves, or provide a serious deterrent to larger starships.

name: Far From Home
description: Many of the lower mammalian life forms found in the galaxy do not understand our Doctrine and true place in the galaxy. Our space must be kept clean of these primitive races, and to do that, we require a vessel that can patrol and defend our borders and root out trouble.

name: The Guardian at our Borders
description: Many of the lower mammalian life forms found in the galaxy do not understand our Doctrine and true place in the galaxy. Our space must be kept clean of these primitive races, and to do that, we require a vessel that can patrol and defend our borders with impunity.

name: Memories of Power Lost
description: Doctrine states that we were the first intelligent beings to evolve in this region of space, and as such as we have an ancient and rightful claim over it. Non-indigenous beings have no rights, and with that in mind, we require a vessel that can enforce our power over those that seek to disrupt Doctrine.

name: Our Glory, Manifest
description: Our manifest destiny and claim over all space is written in the very annals of Doctrine. Our special virtues, our belief and our irresistible destiny to expand across the stars requires vessels of tremendous power and size. These flagships will bring Doctrine to every arm of the galaxy.

name: Coordinated System Defenses Initiative
description: By linking numerous stationary weapon turrets and planetary defenses through one grid, targeting by one sensor could mean that all weapons could fire upon it.

name: Hull Integrity
description: Improvements to the structural integrity field and hull materials allow for stronger, more resilient hulls.

name: The Might of the Destroyer
description: The universe of non-fluidic space is alien to us, we have further adapted our ships to provide more damage.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Type: 01 Bio Destroyer

name: The Determination of the Cruiser
description: The universe of non-fluidic space is alien to us, we have further adapted our designs to support larger and more powerful ships to make our mark across the galaxy.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Type: 01 Bio Cruiser

name: The Wrath of the Unknown
description: We have been improvements to our standard bioship, improving its size, speed and capacity for destruction.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Type: 01 Bio Raider

name: The Power of the Fluidic
description: The Battleship is one of the largest most powerful ships in the fluidic fleet. Offering greater firepower and threat both within Fluidic Space and in the outside realm.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Type: 01 Bio Battleship

name: Home among the Solid
description: Once at home amongst fluidic space, we now have a new home amongst the solid and vast darkness of this universe. The pinnacle of our biovessel design adapted fully to this universe begins here.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Type: 01 Bio Behemoth

name: The Extermination of the Impure
description: The universe contains an abundance of the impure, our Exterminators are there to see that their existence is a short one.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Type: 01 Bio Warship

name: The Revenge of the Vanquisher
description: The Vanquisher is designed with one purpose, to clear threats from Fluidic Space with fire and might. Few vessels can match its power in either space.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Building: Building Nursery 3 | Ship Type: 01 Bio Vanquisher

name: The Mutating Death
description: The Fluidic realm must expand and experience the perfectation that comes from life within the Fluidic domain. The Infester ship spreads the Undine biological infection to other worlds and species to consume them.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Bombardment Stance: Bombardment 2 | Country Limit: 01 Infester Limit | Ship Type: 01 Bio Infester

name: Emmette-Type Frigate
description: The initial Warp Delta designs call for a triangular hull with two warp nacelles situated above the hull. Major research and development is required to undertake these first steps into the unknown.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Ship Types: Scout Freedom, Frigate Emette

name: Starfleet Design Principles
description: The iconic saucer and twin-nacelle system are just some of the unique Starfleet Design Principles that ship design is based upon. Whilst some designs deviate from this, the core design remains the same as it has since the beginning.

name: Light Cruiser Blueprints
description: Lessons learnt over the past few years of space flight have allowed designers to create the idea for a larger, more robust starship - a light cruiser.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Ship Type: Light Cruiser Intrepid Type

name: The NX Project
description: The NX Project, also known as the NX Program or NX Test Program, is Starfleet's effort to develop a starship using the engine designed by the Warp Five program.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Country Limit: Hero Ship Nx Limit | Ship Type: Explorer Nx | Starbase Buildings: Yards, Yards, Yards

name: Long-Range Explorer Advanced Prototype
description: The results from the NX programme offer some insight into our next step, including the latest technologies in refitting our starships.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Ship Type: Carrier Minuteman

name: Multi-Mission Cruiser Blueprints
description: Expeditions into the depths of space can require anything from a battlecruiser to a research laboratory. Our initial forays into this have resulted in a potential design for a multi-mission vessel, capable of undertaking numerous types of mission by itself.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Types: Mmv Poseidon, Heavy Cruiser Yorktown

name: Light Cruiser Advanced Prototype
description: As technologies progress and new hull materials become available, our vessels need to be able to travel deeper into outer space than ever before. A new light cruiser design would get us there.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom, ship | Megastructure: Imperial Starfleet Historical Agency | Ship Type: Light Cruiser Bonaventure

name: Multi-Mission Cruiser Advanced Prototype
description: Advancements to the multi-mission cruiser require new hulls to accommodate the new technology. One such prototype is a potential future workhorse of the fleet.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom, ship | Ship Types: Scout Malachowski, Mmv Walker | Tradition: Ufp Ships 2

name: Heavy Cruiser Blueprints
description: Dangers of deep space continue to become more common, and ship construction techniques have improved enough for designers to come up with the first heavy cruiser design.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom, ship | Ship Types: Frigate Magee, Frigate Saladin, Light Cruiser Shepard, Carrier Engle, Heavy Cruiser Nimitz

name: Advanced Cruiser Blueprints
description: Further enhancements to cruiser technology have led to multiple options for the fleet, including unique options for some extreme science.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom, ship | Country Limits: Hero Ship Constitution Limit, Hero Ship Crossfield Limit, Hero Ship Protostar Limit | Ship Types: Shuttle Class C Shuttle, Hero Ship Crossfield, Hero Ship Constitution, Flagship Constitution, Explorer Hoover, Explorer Cardenas, Heavy Cruiser Constitution, Advanced Cruiser Crossfield

name: Ares Project
description: Heavy modular vessels capable of withstanding a large amount of punishment are on the drawing boards, allowing for the creation of the Ares class and a smaller, more flexible vessel known as the Miranda.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship, Custom | Ship Types: Carrier Ptolomy, Explorer Miranda, Heavy Cruiser Ares | Tradition: Ufp Ships 3

name: Next Generation Starship Technologies
description: The first decades of space travel have shown what works and what doesn't. The development of new hull materials has resulted in the potential for new vessels, much more potent than the previous generation.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Type: Light Cruiser Kelvin

name: Age of Discovery
description: The initial forays into space have provided us a wealth of information. New vessels must be constructed to delve deeper and further than ever before.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Ship Type: Scout Daedalus

name: Constitution & Federation Class Heavy Cruisers
description: The advent of duotronic computers allows for the construction of larger vessels, automated enough that the crew can still be manageable. The heavy cruiser Constitution design is ideal for the nascent five-year mission plan.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom, ship | Ship Type: Exploration Cruiser Federation

name: Second Generation Starship Technologies
description: The five-year mission programmes have offered unique insights into the shortcomings of our fleet, whilst operating away from regular supply. Technologies to rectify the shortcomings and bolster the positives can be put into place for the next generation of starships.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Section: MEDIUM_GUN_01 | Ship Type: Mmv Radiant

name: Civilian Ships Retooling
description: As technology progresses and new hull materials become available, our vessels need to be able to travel further and undertake more work than ever before.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Ship Type: Scout Oberth

name: Field Refits
description: Redesigning new hulls for new technologies is a time consuming process, especially as older hulls are often still valid. Refits utilising the newest technology can be applied to older vessels.

Ship Type: Miranda Second Generation Deep Space Explorer

name: The Grand Experiment
description: The largest pitfall to our current technology is the mismatch of previous generation vessels attempting to run the latest technology. A refit programme which will modernise the fleet could be undertaken, as well as potentially creating a newer, more modern cruiser.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship, Custom | Ship Types: Flagship Excelsior, Advanced Cruiser Excelsior | Tradition: Ufp Ships 4

name: Third Generation Starship Technologies
description: After the recent conflicts across the galaxy, we are in an arms race to ensure we can maintain our sovereignty. The creation of new ship types where exploration is no longer the primary objective allows for new designs to come to the forefront.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship, Custom | Country Limit: Hero Ship Excelsior Limit | Ship Types: Hero Ship Excelsior, Frigate Akula, Light Cruiser Centaur, Carrier Sydney

name: Advanced Field Prototypes
description: Older designs that are still capable can be further improved by advanced retrofits with the latest technology.

name: Exploration Cruiser Blueprints
description: The exploration cruiser is a starship classification term used to describe a type of cruiser starship designed for exploration, and to operate entirely independently from starbase supply. These are larger vessels, outfitted to be capable of holding their own in the unknown.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom, ship | Country Limit: Hero Ship Ambassador Limit | Ship Types: Hero Ship Ambassador, Flagship Excelsior, Flagship Ambassador, Light Cruiser Curry Type, Mmv Constellation, Exploration Cruiser Ambassador

name: Advanced Cruiser Prototype
description: Prototypes of the latest advanced cruiser design have been put forward, and requires further research to fully develop the design.

name: Civilian Industries
description: As technology progresses and new hull materials become available, our vessels need to be able to travel further and undertake more work than ever before.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Ship Section: Section Template | Ship Type: Scout Olympic

name: The Galaxy Project
description: The Galaxy Class Starship Development Project is the project responsible for the development of a new type of vessel for Starfleet. The Galaxy class is designed to be one of the most powerful and capable starships of its generation, with a crew complement of over a thousand and the multi-mission capability to act as a central hub for a fleet of smaller starships.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom, ship | Country Limit: Hero Ship Galaxy Limit | Ship Types: Hero Ship Galaxy, Flagship Galaxy, Scout Freedom Tng, Heavy Cruiser Nebula, Exploration Cruiser Galaxy | Tradition: Ufp Ships 5

name: Galaxy Project Design Principles
description: Utilising the lessons learnt in the Galaxy Project, our scientists can expand the design principles to the rest of the fleet. Improvements to our existing cruisers should be possible.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship, Custom | Ascension Perk: Starfleet Texas Class | Ship Types: Raven, Frigate Challenger, Frigate California, Light Cruiser Niagara, Explorer New Orleans, Explorer Cheyenne, Mmv Springfield

name: Heavy Escort Blueprints
description: Our design philosophy has never been war first, each of our starships has always had a multi-mission role in mind. With the dangers in the galaxy at present however, the board has a design for a vessel class devoted entirely to weapons and armour - the Defiant.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Country Limit: Escort Ship Defiant Limit | Ship Types: Escort Ship Defiant, Heavy Escort Defiant

name: Fourth Generation Starship Technologies
description: To combat the warships of other races the Federation requires a new starship design school that prioritises weaponry over multi-mission performance.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship, Custom | Ship Section: Section Template | Ship Types: Mmv Akira, Mmv Norway

name: Streamlined Hull Design
description: The advances with warp technologies now provide new opportunities to streamline the hull of our vessels.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Country Limit: Hero Ship Sovereign Limit | Ship Types: Hero Ship Sovereign, Flagship Galaxy, Flagship Sovereign, Scout Nova, Carrier Iwo Jima, Explorer Intrepid Class, Heavy Cruiser Sovereign, Exploration Cruiser Luna

name: Small Starship Retooling Phase
description: Situations arise that are too unimportant for a larger starship but still need to be resolved by something with strong capabilities. The creation of smaller vessels such as the Saber class has been brought to the drawing room.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship, Custom | Ship Types: Light Cruiser Steamrunner, Light Cruiser Saber, Light Cruiser Parliament

description: Experimental technologies and future proofing are the order of the day here. New technologies require new testbed designs in order to test them for maximum effectiveness.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship, Custom | Ship Types: Hero Ship Protostar, Scout Protostar, Advanced Cruiser Vesta, Heavy Escort Prometheus

name: Vigilant Class Refit
description: The next evolution of the Defiant Class escort, providing a sleeker profile and learning from the lessons that the Defiant Class creating a modern escort vessel.

name: Advanced Exploration Cruiser Prototype
description: Improvements to our exploration cruisers have allowed us to design a prototype for a new class of Exploration Cruiser.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Ship Types: Frigate Galen, Carrier Samson, Adv Heavy Cruiser Inquiry

name: Shuttlepod

unlock_details.description: Ship Types: Defense Fed 1, Shuttle Shuttlepod, Carrier Sarajevo | Starbase Building: Craft | Starbase Module: Bay Fed

name: Lander Pod Squadrons
description: A small utility craft that can be outfitted with weaponry. The pod comprises a spherical cockpit connected to an aft section containing four extendable stabilising vanes, which could rotate freely around the cockpit to maintain position and attitude.

name: Class F Shuttlecraft
description: Constructed with a duranium metal shell, the class F was propelled by an ion engine and protected by a deflector shield. It has a much larger range than previous vessels of this type.

unlock_details.description: Ship Types: Shuttle Class C Shuttle, Shuttle Class F Shuttle, Attack Wing Galileo, Attack Wing Daqtagh, Attack Wing Shalimar | Starbase Module: Bay Fed

unlock_details.description: Ship Types: Shuttle Class F Shuttle, Shuttle Type 7 Shuttle

name: Delta Flyer Prototype
description: The Delta Flyer is a vessel that is designed to handle environments that would be too hazardous for a standard shuttlecraft or fighter craft and for situations where sending in a starship is foolhardy. Its long range weaponry and warp engines ensure these ships can strike deep into the heart of enemy fleets.

name: Danube-Class Runabout
description: The Danube-class designs are meant to deal with situations that demand a vessel more capable than a standard shuttlecraft, but lower profile than a full-sized starship.

unlock_details.description: Ship Types: Defense Fed 2, Runabout Danube | Starbase Module: Bay Fed

name: Peregrine Assault Fighter
description: The Peregrine Assault Fighter is lightly armed with cannons, very fast, maneuverable, and protected by armour and shielding. In large numbers these fighters pose a threat to even capital ships.

unlock_details.description: Ship Types: Attack Wing Galileo, Attack Wing Peregrine, Attack Wing Bop Wing

unlock_details.description: Ship Types: Attack Wing Peregrine, Attack Wing Gryphon

As such, the aft section of the Odyssey variants were converted into docking ports for Aquarius-class light escorts.

unlock_details.description: Ship Types: Defense Fed 4, Shuttle Type 7 Shuttle, Shuttle Aquarius, Runabout Venture

Much like the Intrepid design complemented the Galaxy design.

name: Artificial Hypersonic Elements

This group's notable elements include dilithium, tngonian, and princessium. These elements are too unstable to exist naturally but could benefit several areas of research; such sensors, medicine, and construction.

description: For obtaining coal, and other minerals found in stratified layers; it may be necessary to remove whole hillsides and mountains to obtain these resources.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Mining Network 3, Building Mining Network 2

name: Particle Impeller Mining
description: Modified field technology, not unlike the 'space elevator' concept of cheaply lifting things to orbit, can be used to excavate and bring minerals to orbit for conveyance elsewhere.

name: Aperiodic Tiling Quasi-Crystals
description: Aperiodic tiling quasi-crystals have been involved in research and development for hundreds of years, with limited success. The high energy and temperatures involved in modern technology means their electrical and heat resistant properties are needed now, more than ever. Luckily, we can combine advanced manufacturing technology with designs inspired by crystals found while exploring space.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Mining Network 4, Building Mining Network 3

name: Matter Recombinations
description: Recent investigations into chemistry and astrogeology show the potential for rare types of crystals and minerals deep within the core of certain planets. These materials, which when combined with our own materials, could offer substantially increases in effectiveness.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Research, Research Node

name: Extraction Patterns
description: Changes in how mineral deposits are evaluated relative to each other lead to more efficient boring patterns.

name: Matter Compression
description: Compressing suitable materials into ultra-dense forms is a cheap and efficient way to improve their ability to absorb weapons-grade impacts.

name: Dilithium-Hydroxyl Distillation
description: Dilithium hydroxyl is a gaseous dilithium compound. It has been noted to form a significant portion of several nebulae. Collecting and distilling this will help ensure our fleets have adequate amounts of dilithium for decades or even centuries to come.

name: Prototyping Engineering Facility
description: With the need of a specialised workforce comes a need for specialised facilities to carry out delicate work and experiments.

name: Asteroid Tunneling Techniques
description: New asteroid tunneling methods allow for upgrades to our asteroid bases.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Decision: Expand Hirogen Base

name: Private Engineering Contractors
description: As space travel becomes more commonplace, competing citizens often believe they can do things better and faster than each other. By outsourcing the creation of mining stations to these contractors, we can lower the overall cost outlay whilst still maintaining the income.

name: Zero Compression Techniques
description: Second-stage processing of pseudo-refined minerals allow for more efficient storage and transportation.

unlock_details.description: Building: Resource Silo 1 | Starbase Building: Silo

name: Ancient Forging Techniques
description: The ancient ways of forging weapons have been rediscovered, which created weapons far beyond their time in the past. By researching ways to apply modern technology to our techniques, we can produce some of the finest weaponry the galaxy has ever seen.

name: Exotic Matter Refining
description: Exotic matter covers a range of very rare resources which can be utilised for their unique properties.

name: Particle Fountain
description: The particle fountain enables the manipulation and creation of even the rarest particles in existence.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Megastructures: Build Stage, Build Complete

name: Topaline Refining
description: Topaline is a rare mineral critical to the function of key systems. Naturally-occurring, Topaline is mostly used as a key shield component.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Starbase Buildings: Refinery, Processing

name: Tallonian Crystal Mining
description: Tallonian crystals are precious gemstones which offer substantial focusing properties when used in high-end technology.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Starbase Buildings: Refinery, Processing

name: Trellium-D Distillation
description: Trellium is a mineral used as hull plating, which is particularly effective against anomalies, and comes in multiple forms. It can only be synthesized in liquid form, with varying degrees of difficulty. It is Trellium-D that is very useful as insulation, which is the rarest trellium mineral and difficult to synthesise. Our advances in distillation techniques have allowed us to locate potential Trellium deposits.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Buildings: Fabricator 1, Fabricator 2, Trellium Mine 1, Trellium Mining Facility | Starbase Buildings: Refinery, Processing

name: Pergium Refining
description: Pergium, a radioactive mineral found on assorted worlds, can be mined, refined, and utilized as an energy source.

unlock_details.description: Other: component | Buildings: Pergium Mine 1, Pergium Power Plant 1, Pergium Mining Facility

name: Geothermal Fracking
description: New fracking techniques will allow us to tap into previously unattainable pockets of geothermal resources deep beneath the planet's crust.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Forge Capital 3 | Decision: Planet Specialisation Configuration

name: Power Drilling
description: Assorted drilling techniques can be developed to access parts of a planet, asteroid, etc; that would otherwise be inaccessible due to thermal, geological, or safety considerations.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Forge Capital 3, Forge Capital 4, Forge Capital 5

name: Refining Techniques
description: Dilithium is a critical component for all but the most rudimentary of warp core designs. Like any resource, it requires a degree of processing before it can be used. By improving our mining techniques, we should be able to locate foreign sources of dilithium and mine them via our mining stations.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Buildings: Dilithium Mine 1, Dilithium Mining Facility

name: Synthetic Dilithium Processing
description: The creation of dilithium via synthetic means might be possible with this new energy-intensive process.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Crystal Plant 1 | Starbase Building: Refinery

name: Dilithium Crystals Reamplification
description: The reamplification of used dilithium crystals may be possible to reenergise them.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Mining Network 2, Mining Network 3, Mining Network 4, Building Mining Network 1, Building Mining Network 2, Building Mining Network 3, Crystal Plant 2

name: Pseudo Crystal Mining
description: It's like crystal mining, but not.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Research, Research Node

name: Gamma Radiation Dilithium Refining
description: Initial tests into utilising gamma radiation to power up the dilithium crystalline matrix show promising results.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Mining Network 3, Mining Network 4, Building Mining Network 3

name: Mineral Isolation
description: Advanced spectrometry combines fracking techniques and chemical flushing to rapidly exploit shallow and mid-depth lying deposits.

name: Piezoelectric Field Harvesters
description: New mining techniques exploiting the piezoelectric properties of dilithium crystals are ready for testing. If successful, they will allow us to mine dilithium deposits that may have been too small to be worth the time previously required to excavate. A minor boost in the amount of dilithium available to our fleets should follow.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Mining Network 4, Building Mining Network 3, Crystal Plant 3

name: Theta-Matrix Re-Crystallisation
description: The extreme energy and force that a dilithium crystal experiences will slowly break down its crystalline structure. Using a combination of high energy theta radiation and warp plasma, it is possible to force it to crystallise. Theta radiation and warp plasma are both available at a warp core and so the dilithium crystal can be processed without having to be removed from its core assembly.

name: Urban Planning
description: By creating adjoining colony buttresses to the main colony hub we can increase the amount of civilian housing on the planet, utilising the resources of all other adjoining buttresses.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Foundry 1, Factory 1, Factory Distillery 1, Acquisition Plant 1 | Starbase Buildings: Refinery, Processing

name: Buttressed Core Support Hub
description: By creating adjoining colony buttresses to the main hub we can increase the amount of civilian housing on the planet, utilising the resources of all other adjoining buttresses.

name: Planetary Industrial Complex
description: The application of planetary industrial base requires further research into how the logistical challenge of combining an entire worlds industrial output into one entity.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Foundry 2, Factory 2, Factory Distillery 2, Acquisition Plant 2

name: Self-Contained Biosphere Tower
description: Also known as arcologies, these enormous structures are self-contained in that every need of a citizen can be met within the tower, from health, to work, to ecosystem.

name: Arcology Construction
description: The construction of an arcology, an enormous self-sufficient population unit which utilises all its own resources without impact on the rest of the colony, can allow for large amounts of population within a smaller area.

name: Bionic Architecture Cityscape
description: A living city has been a dream of many thinkers across the galaxy, but our advances in computing and construction may allow this to be a possibility, where everything is linked to one another for high efficiency.

name: X-Seed Megastructure
description: A massive mountain-sized arcology has been a dream of many architects; however, research only now has progressed to the level where it may be possible.

name: Automated Mega Factories
description: Automation of construction allows for a massive amount of industrial output with a limited population.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Foundry 3, Factory 3, Factory Distillery 3, Acquisition Plant 3

name: Anti-Gravity Engineering
description: The construction of buildings and structures without the constraints of gravity allows a freedom of engineering and architecture never before seen.

name: Metropolis
description: Stretching across a continent, these space age metropolises are vast cities or conurbation which make up a significant economic, political, and cultural center for a world, and an important hub for planetary connections, commerce, and communications.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Factory 4, Factory Distillery 4, Acquisition Plant 4 | Districts: Domed City, City Slums

name: Industrial Hive
description: The industrial hive is a foundry where each manufacturing plant is located in order to minimise downtime due to transportation of goods.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Foundry Machine 1, Maintenance Depot 1, Foundry Undine 1, Holodeck Undine 1

name: Micro Replicators
description: Small replication devices for complex machinery allow for the replacement of parts on a regular basis without requiring expensive processing node input.

name: Dynamic Infrastructure
description: Machinery that can adapt and adjust to changes in manufacturing output.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Foundry Machine 2, Maintenance Depot 2, Foundry Undine 2, Holodeck Undine 2

name: Nanite Assemblers
description: Smaller nanite assemblers can be utilised in order to produce nanites which can produce complex machinery.

name: Binary Motivators
description: A motivator or a motivator unit is a device that was primarily used to convert other forms of energy such as chemical or electrical energy into kinetic or mechanical energy.

name: Hyper-Linked Motivators
description: The combining of motivators on a large scale allows for rapid construction of mass scale parts. By linking them together, a single set of hyper-linked motivators could take a ton of raw minerals and turn it into working and functional products by the end of the chain.

name: Dedicated Replication Platform
description: Dedicated replication platforms allow for more complex machinery to simply be replicated rather than fabricated.

name: Nano Motivators
description: Nano scale motivators can be used and programmed to perform a variety of automated tasks, ensuring the efficiency of production increases.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Foundry Machine 3, Maintenance Depot 3, Foundry Undine 3, Holodeck Undine 3

name: Anti-Gravity Construction
description: With the invention of controlled gravity plating, the construction of buildings and starships has changed allowing for what would be once infeasible structures due to gravity to now be created.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Holodeck Undine 4 | Districts: Nexus, Habitation Node, Hive Habitat

name: Metallic Metropolis
description: A metallic metropolis propels urban innovation to new frontiers, reshaping cities with steel and alloys. This synthesis of metallurgy and synthetic innovation creates havens of efficiency, where artificial life transforms the darkness of space into a symphony of luminescence.

name: Emergency Backup Systems
description: When main systems go down it can often prove fatal for those onboard. Emergency systems can be introduced to give a window of opportunity to restore the main systems and provide security for those onboard.

name: Polarised Hull Plating
description: Through the application of an electromagnetic field to the ship's hull, the structural integrity can be significantly increased, protecting the starship from enemy weapons fire.

name: Inertia Manipulation
description: The lack of motion-resisting forces in space allows starships to generate extreme acceleration compared to atmospheric craft. This poses a threat to the safety of our crews, and we must hastily find a way of managing their effect on the ship. Early proposals are focusing on using graviton manipulations or gyroscopic technology, but it is likely that new forms of technology will quickly emerge.

name: Hull Plating Relay Array
description: Using superior construction methods, we can increase the density of the hull plating relay array along the exterior hull. Each array in the relay polarizes the hull at a different frequency, increasing the density, strength and efficiency of the polarising field.

name: Trellium Plating
description: Trellium is a mineral that can used as a hull material. The rarest, Trellium-D, cannot be synthesised easily and is the most effective form of hull plating.

name: Trellium Shielding
description: Using Trellium-D for its unique properties against anomalies allows for a hardened shielding on many vessels, which increases structural integrity.

name: Planetary Shielding
description: Shielding a planet is not simply a matter of building the vast infrastructure to sustain it. First our scientists must find a way of forming the shield without causing apocalyptic changes to the planet's atmosphere. If successful, it will provide additional protection during orbital bombardment.

unlock_details.description: Building: Planetary Shield 3 | Tradable Action: Action Bulwark Technology

name: Structural Integrity Field
description: The structural integrity fieldwasdevelopedto supplement the natural structural integrity of the material their starship hullswere composed of. Engineers use a structural integrity force field to supplement the supports and bulkheads that give aspacecraft its shape. Improved force field generators make starships more capable of enduring the harsh elementsand forces ofinterstellar travel.

name: Rotating Structural Integrity Field
description: The structural integrity field was developed to supplement the natural structural integrity of the material their starship hulls were composed of. Engineers use a structural integrity field to supplement the supports and bulkheads that give a spacecraft its shape. Advanced force field generators and arrays make starships even more capable of enduring the elements and forces of interstellar travel.

name: Ablative Armor
description: Ablative armor iswas originally designed as a primitive heat shielding for spacecraft. Over time it has been refined into an armor designed to disintegrate at a controlled rate under directed energy blasts, providing an additional layer of defense for starships.

name: Ablative Generator
description: Using a technology similar to replicators, this generator can create an nearly impenetrable layer of additional armor outside of the normal hull of the ship.

name: Aldean Planetary Cloaking Device
description: The Aldeans were a proud and mighty people. Their science and art are legendary to the ends of myths. The myth became fact when Aldea was discovered. Aldea became a legend by use of a planetary scale cloaking device. This cloak uses energy fields to repolarize the atoms in the upper atmosphere to become a massive impenetrable cloak.

name: Living Metallic Hull
description: Most species would consider metal incapable of being alive; however, we are not so small minded. By using nanoprobes and matter-energy conversion technology, we can tend to our metal hulls in the same way than an organic body tends to its skin. With some further experimentation we can refine the implementation of this technology.

name: Regenerative Weave Hull
description: Self-repairing hulls give our vessels significant operational autonomy, allowing them to recover from moderate damage, without deviating from their assignment. The next logical step is to improve the material composition of the hull, enhancing its durability. Duranium fits the availability and toughness profile; however, a way needs to be found for the repair nanoprobes to easily manipulate it.

name: Paricium Memory Foam Alloy
description: There are many mechanisms through which damage can be inflicted to a vessel's hull. As duranium polyweave provides sufficient kinetic penetration and explosive resistance, the current primary weaknesses are to blunt impact and mechanical shockwaves. A supplementary hull material could be created from paricium; it possess shock resistant properties and can be easily molded into various forms.

name: Duranium Buckybull Sheeting
description: Wir untersuchen kontinuierlich die Leistung unserer Hllen, um Schwachstellen frhzeitig zu erkennen. Unsere Ergebnisse deuten darauf hin, dass das Duranium-Polygeflecht nicht mehr ausreichend leistungsfhig ist. Eine Buckyball-Plattenstruktur wird einen besseren Schutz bieten. Bevor wir diese nderung vornehmen knnen, mssen wir die optimale Art und Weise der Schichtung mit dem Paricium-Gedchtnisschaum berechnen und die Reparatur-Nanosonden neu programmieren.

name: Kelindide-Victurium Composite Hull
description: Victurium alloy has sufficient durability to be a viable replacement for duranium in our hulls. However, it has several unacceptable qualities which will interfere with standard vessel operations, including scrambling transporter signals and disrupting hull repair nanoprobe control. It could be used as a buttressing material if an equally durable material is found to form the primary layer.

name: Tetraburnium Nano-Weave Hull
description: Victurium-kelindide hull plating is proving to be as durable as predicted but requires orders of magnitudes more nanoprobes to repair at an acceptable rate. Tetraburnium alloy has several key properties that make it a viable replacement hull material. It is easier to manipulate than victurium and kelindide, has a high tensile strength, and is extremely heat and pressure resistant.

name: Tritanium Mesh
description: We are having difficulty producing enough tetraburnium alloy to supply all of our vessels. Rather than accepting substandard hull construction, we need to adapt. Tritanium is both common and strong, making it suitable for use in developing a supplementary hull layer. The most efficient way of preserving the tetraburnium nanoweave layer would be to use the tritanium to create an ablative layer.

name: Tritanium Shape Memory Alloy Hull
description: The assimilation of species 9452 has added new knowledge of tritanium refining and processing. This species primary resistance factor was from the hull of their vessels. They were formed from a tritanium based substance that would attempt to recover its previous shape after sustaining damage. Adapting this substance for our hulls will greatly enhance their regenerative ability.

name: Cortical Implants
description: Cortical Implants are devices to interface humanoids with various technology. The Collective would benefit greatly, as drones would be able to interface with technology, allowing regeneration and interfacing with hostile technology.

name: Warp Energy Matrices
description: Energy usage throughout the warp core is constantly utilised with a high throughput, allowing for improved calculations and processing. By allowing energy matrices to transfer information at light-speed velocities, we can increase the overall energy throughput and storage.

name: Transwarp-Enabled Interlink
description: Transwarp Enabled Interlink Nodes allow for drones to communicate with each other at transwarp speeds, allowing for faster, better, and more efficient tactical communication across battlefields.

name: Transwarp Energy Matrices
description: Energy usage throughout the transwarp matrix is constantly utilised with a high throughput, allowing for improved calculations and processing. By allowing energy matrices to transfer information at transwarp velocities, we can increase the overall energy throughput and storage.

name: Mobile Transwarp Aperture Construction
description: Travelling through transwarp requires complex calculations, reinforced structural integrity, and robust navigational processes. By constructing mobile transwarp apertures, or 'portals', we can ease the passage of our vessels into warp and navigate through space more efficiently and rapidly, allowing for the rapid deployment of our forces across the galaxy.

name: Intergalactic Expansion
description: The continued expansion of the Collective's starbases across the stars requires abundant resources and research to ensure the Collective can maintain its cohesion and control over large distances.

name: Titanium Hull
description: Titanium is a strong, ductile, low-density, lightweight metal that is quite reflective. With these impressive qualities, titanium is a good material to make our ship hulls from until we inevitably find a better material.

name: Tritanium Hull
description: Tritanium is a metallic alloy which is about 20 times harder than diamonds. If we are able to discover how to melt it, we can apply this alloy to make our ships more durable.

name: Magnesite Refining
description: Magnesite is a form of magnesium carbonate and is known to be a readily available material for hull production.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Starbase Buildings: Refinery, Processing

name: Breakthrough in Advanced Materials
description: Through exploring space, we have seen many wondrous new materials that we never dreamed existed. Combining these discoveries with the latest technology, such as matter-energy manipulation, is leading to the biggest revolution in material science history. Soon, we will not be limited by what we can mine or smelt, but by how we tweak these materials to suit our needs, whatever we decide they are.

name: Light Hull Construction
description: With the concept of 'less is more' in mind, we can develop starship hulls that are lighter while remaining strong. This allows our ships to be more agile, while still receiving suitable protection from the rigors of space travel.

name: Armored Hull Construction
description: By sacrificing some agility and manoeuvrability, we can heavily armour our starships in the densest materials we can find.

name: Reinforced Hull Construction
description: Layering honeycomb structures and additional bulkheads throughout our vessels provides increased survivability in the event the hull is breached.

name: Modular Hull Construction
description: By utilising easily replaceable sections, we can create a modular hull design where sections can be replaced to suit the vessel's current mission. Whilst not as strong as other designs, it is the most cost-effective way to design a vessel.

name: Paricium Hull
description: A ceramic alloy, often mixed with Talgonite, used in hull construction. It is light, but comes at the cost of reduced armour effectiveness.

name: Magnesite-Paricium Hull
description: An alloy constructed of magnesite and paricium is a lighter and stronger alternative for hull construction than the electroceramic methods used in previous iterations.

name: Magnesite-Monotanium Hull
description: The improvements to monotanium refining allow an alloy constructed of magnesite and monotanium to be utilised in the construction of our vessels' hulls. It is a much lower mass than previous alloys, allowing our vessels to be nimbler.

name: Magnesite-Tritanium Mesh
description: The implementation of a magnesite-tritanium mesh further strengthens the hull of our vessels, whilst remaining exceedingly light.

name: Perfectly Reflective Kelindide Sheeting
description: Energy weapons are not absorbed easily by this strong and perfectly reflective sheeting in laboratory tests. Further research is required for full implementation amongst the fleet.

name: Kelindide Energy Dispersal Hull
description: Kelindide arranged into a honeycombed pattern can disperse energy across the armoured hull.

name: Kelindide Reactive Armour Layers
description: Layered armour plates that counteract weapon attacks are part of the new kelindide range of hull armour.

name: Kelindide-Tetraburnium Hull
description: The new alloy of kelindide and tetraburnium is much stronger than either material by itself. Further research into implementation within the fleet is required.

name: Duranium PolyWeave Hull
description: The testing of duranium polyweave alloys has developed a sturdy material that can take a large amount of punishment before finally buckling.

name: Duranium-Victurium Hull
description: The implementation of Duranium alloy to our starships have been a monumental success. Now, we just discovered a new metal alloy called Victurium, which seems to be just as strong as Duranium. If we combine these two metallic alloys together, we will have the basis of an even stronger hull that further increases the durability of our ships' hulls.

name: Duranium Composite Sheeting
description: Duranium is an extremely strong metal that is used by many species for starship hulls due to its suitability as armor. It is heavy though, potentially increasing a ship's mass and making it less maneuverable.

name: Poly-Duranium Weave Hull
description: Another metallic alloy has been classified, and this one we are calling Poly-Duranium Weave. Going along the branch of our Duranium and Duranium-Victurium type alloys, this alloy is even stronger than those, providing further increases to the durability of our ships' hulls.

name: Parametallic Plating
description: If we want to make our starships more durable, we could look into additional materials that can be placed on the external layers of our starship hulls. By combining different types of materials together, we have come up with another type of armor plating. This new type of alloy will provide the additional protection needed against weapon fire or hazardous materials a starship's hull may encounter.

name: Non-Reactive Hull Design
description: The creation of a hull that is simply non-reactive to energy bursts is a very cost-effective way of providing protection for a vessel.

name: Poly-Duranide Alloys
description: Polyduranide is a metallic material used for construction purposes. It is cheap and easy to mass produce via machinery but tough to replicate.

name: Plasticised Trititanium Mesh
description: An unreactive plasticised mesh covering for the hull of our vessels could allow them to offer substantial protection in a way that is extremely cost-effective to do so.

name: Interplanetary Expeditionary Forces
description: When exploration turns to interstellar war, we require more people to defend our worlds and conquer those of our enemies. As these armies will be larger than any our civilisation has previously fielded, we need to revolutionise how we think about organising, training, supplying, and deploying them. The establishment of an 'Interplanetary Expeditionary Force' is the first step towards this goal.

name: Powered Exo-Skeleton
description: Wearing a powered exoskeleton suit augments the user's strength and speed. The military applications are obvious.

name: Personal Vacuum-Resistant Energy Suit
description: Vacuum suits are often cumbersome and unwieldy however personal shielding can be modified to offer a short term vacuum suit made entirely of energy. This has obvious military and scientific benefits.

name: Personal Shields
description: Personal shields have long been desired by personnel exposed to hazards. It is not just a case of miniaturising the technology enough to be wearable. Current shield implementations would make it difficult for the user to walk as well as suffocating them, but we believe we can come up with ways to circumvent that issue.

name: Micro-fusion Thrusters
description: Nuclear fusion is the process of combining atoms to create larger atoms. When this occurs, energy is released. Thus, nuclear fusion reactors create incredibly hot plasma. This plasma has many uses. One such use is to expel it from a spacecraft, providing significantly more thrust than a chemical burn thruster. Miniaturising these thrusters allows them to be used in missiles and torpedoes.

name: Breakthrough in Propulsion Design
description: Despite the importance of a starships propulsion system, they have often received relatively little attention. Most improvements are simply iterations of existing designs. However, general advances in technology and a starships technical capability, mean that engineers are now developing prototypes of advanced engines. We will have to examine our needs and chose a complimentary design.

name: High-Gain Impulse Thruster
description: Impulse thrusters vent high energy plasma to provide thrust. There are two main distinctions between them and fusion thrusters. Impulse thrusters can use plasma from a warp core in addition to a fusion reactor, and they generally use a more complex exhaust manifold to greatly increase their efficiency. By further developing this technology, we can achieve even greater sublight speeds.

name: Low Temperature Thruster
description: Low temperature thrusters have a lower top speed, but make up for it with a smaller sensor footprint. This is useful during combat were tracking a fast, evasive starship, which is equipped with a variety of countermeasures, can be difficult. When these thrusters fire, it takes marginally longer for a hostile ship to isolate their signature, increasing the chance that an evasive move will succeed.

name: Anti-Gravity Assisted Impulse Drive
description: Current generation impulse drives use as much of the high energy plasma as they can. We will need to think of a different approach to increase our starships speeds. One possible solution is to create an anti-gravity wake behind the ship, repelling it in the direction of travel. This application of graviton technology has not been attempted before, doubtlessly there will be hurdles to overcome.

name: Avidyne Impulse
description: Research on gravity assisted engines has been abandoned. Our technology and scientific knowledge are not yet advanced enough to make it work correctly. For now, the Avidyne Propulsion Research and Testing Complex is attempting to apply the latest plasma dynamics research to impulse engines. New engine designs based on this work should allow us to use impulse plasma more effectively.

name: Improved Impulse Manifold
description: Avidyne impulse drives have suffered from handling problems, often being described as twitchy or jumpy. This problem has been traced to incompatibilities between the pulsed plasma exhaust, and the exhaust manifold geometry. This manifold design was restricted by the materials available. As new materials have been developed, it might now be possible to design a compatible manifold geometry.

name: Shange Shunt Interface
description: Engineers widely agree that modern warp cores can supply enough high energy plasma to meet our impulse engines demands, without requiring fusion reactors. Many engineering challenges must be overcome to facilitate this change. For example, new plasma shunts will be required to balance the load between the thruster array exhaust ports, without causing instability in the plasma flow characteristics.

name: Compound Impulse Assembly
description: The success of Shange shunt interfaces has opened new opportunities for impulse manifold designers. Ideas for a multi-vector thruster manifold have been drawn up, but current impulse assemblies can not support the design. We will need to create a new assembly, likely building it from miniaturised assembly segments, to form a flexible, compound impulse assembly.

name: Hyper-Impulse Engine
description: Taking the concept of warp reactor driven impulse engines to its logical conclusion, means having dedicated matter-antimatter reactors powering the impulse engines. These small reactors will feed the impulse engines with warp plasma, which is usually reserved for energising the warp coils. There are significant engineering challenges between now, and a working prototype fitted into a starship.

name: Sub-Impulse Paralithium Thruster
description: Paralithium synthesis technology has long been on the watchlist of Avidyne Stealth R&D Yards. Experimental paralithium engines have been shown to produce relatively cold, highly ionised plasma. Hopefully, this can be combined with ion engine technology to create a potent cold thruster. A new paralithium synthesis technique, yielding two orders of magnitude more fuel, will allow research to resume.

name: Low Temperature RCS Thruster
description: Reaction control system thrusters are vital for manoeuvring in space. They are responsible for fine translational and rotational adjustments. Unfortunately, the size of the RCS thruster ports have necessitated using high temperature exhaust to provide adequate force. This is changing, as next generation impulse reactors can route colder plasma to the RCS, at a high enough pressure to be useful.

name: Cooled Impulse Capacitance Cell
description: Impulse capacitance cells have been available for some time, but must keep the plasma hot to prevent de-energisation. If plasma scrubbing technology was to be advanced to the point that 98% of oppositely charged particles were filtered prior to storage, we could store the plasma cold. This would make it suitable for incorporating into our stealth impulse technology.

name: Masked Quaratum Thruster Array
description: Arrays of small, multi-vectored exhaust ports are being developed. If designed correctly, a thruster array will have an easier to mask electro-thermal signature, while greatly improving manoeuvrability. The engines reactors are also being retooled to use a newly certified fuel, quaratum. It has similar operating characteristics to paralithium, but with higher pressure output, increasing thrust.

name: Paragravitic Drive
description: Anti-gravity assisted impulse technology was conceived near the start of our cold impulse engine program. It was quickly dismissed and forgotten due to concerns over the detectability of gravimetric distortions, and our technical ability to control them. Recently, a team of researchers revisited the idea using modern graviton technology, and created a proof-of-concept stealth paragravitic drive.

name: Subspace-Shifted Thruster Array
description: A long forgotten experiment in multispatial sensor technology might prove to be revolutionary for stealth thrusters. It was found that graviton fields can be made to push active sensor beams into subspace. If this can be adapted for pushing thruster plasma exhaust into subspace, the sensor signature of our ships will drop dramatically. We might even be able to begin using hot plasma exhaust.

name: Omni-Directional Impulse
description: Our vessels hull designs are based on simple geometric shapes. They have multiple axis of symmetry, no real front or back. It would be inefficient to limit ourselves to a single direction of motion as most species do, we are capable of more. Thrusters exhaust ports can be mounted on each hull surface and feed by a decentralised network of impulse plasma generator nodes.

name: Omni-Directional Impulse Array
description: Omni-directional thrusters are versatile, however their distributed nature weakens their overall effectiveness. Several technical enhancements are being investigated, such as avidyne reactors, but these might not be ready for an unacceptable amount of time. If a short term solution is required, we can find a way of enlarging the existing system. It will be inefficient, but functional.

name: Omni-Directional High-Gain Impulse Array
description: Thruster arrays have given a moderate power increase at the cost of efficiency, but further improvements are required. As avidyne engines are not yet ready, those improvements will have to be made to the current system. A portion of the current system inefficiency has been traced to the exhaust outlets; their design doesn't effectively limit plasma from dispersing along transverse trajectories.

name: Omni-Directional Avidyne Impulse Array
description: Since assimilating species 91 and becoming aware of the substance known as avidyne, we have pursued it for use as an impulse drive reactant.
