We have finally developed a way of storing this potent, but unstable, chemical for long periods of time. The final obstacle is to miniaturise avidyne synthesis nodes to the point that a sufficient quantity of them can installed on our vessels.

name: Omni-Directional Impulse Manifold Array
description: The old high-gain thrusters were adapted for avidyne plasma exhaust, but are not functioning as efficiently as simulations predicted. We currently lack sufficient data to fully diagnose the problem, but it is likely that our understanding of heavy plasma flow dynamics is flawed. Additional research will correct our understanding and allow us to design a more efficient thruster manifold array.

name: Directional Paragravitic Impulse Array
description: Through assimilation and experimentation, our knowledge of gravity manipulation techniques has advanced immensely. Heuristics predict that we have sufficient knowledge to begin developing an engine that propels a vessel using controlled gravimetric distortions. This technology is likely to be significantly more effective and versatile than our current impulse engine operating principles.

name: Omni-Directional Compound Impulse Array
description: Built from miniaturised assembly segments, to form a flexible, compound impulse assembly, this multi vector thruster manifold provides omni-directional thrust.

name: Omni-Directional Hyper-Impulse Array
description: Dedicated matter-antimatter reactors power the omni-directional impulse field. These small reactors will feed the impulse engines with warp plasma, which is usually reserved for energising the warp coils.

name: Form-Fitting Forcefields
description: Improved force fields that can snap into place around any breach or person to secure them briefly against the vast darkness of empty space.

name: Deep Core Mining
description: Advances in material construction allow for drills and tunnels to reach further into a planet's surface. By breaking through the crust and mantle, we may be able to access materials deep within the core.

name: Tetraburnium-Victurium Hull
description: The newly modified fusion of alloys Victurium and tetraburnium are much stronger than either material by itself. Further research into implementation within the fleet is required.

name: Trititanium-Victurium Hull
description: The merging of a victurium-tritanium mesh adds the strongest possible protection with minimal weight added to the hull.

name: Victurium Shape Memory Alloy Hull
description: Assimilation of our last targets has provided the collective knowledge of the rare alloy Victurium and the benefits of applying this material to the hull of our ships.

name: Repurposed Modular Hull Material
description: By collecting and repurposing the hull parts of the species we assimilate, the Collective does not need to build our vessels from scratch. Also, making our vessels modular allows for efficient repairs.

name: Tactical Drone
description: Utilising the most advanced command programs and most advanced technology, tactical drones are the most skilled drones in the Collective. Assimilation of targets will be more efficient.

name: Ullage Gronerium Afterburner
description: Although more advanced propulsion systems are now the standard, older-style chemical thrusters have a range of uses. The latest high-performance fuel to be synthesised is a liquid called Gronerium. Before we can begin using this fuel, we must design a modern, liquid-fuel storage system, overcoming the reliability problems inherent to using liquid-fueled thrusters in low-gravity environments.

name: Inertial Retrothruster Afterburner
description: Inertial dampers absorb the inertial force generated by impulse and warp drive acceleration. It is theoretically possible to use the dampers in reverse and provide limited acceleration. Current inertial dampers don't have the capability to do so, as it would increase their size and power consumption. By designing new dampers we can equip starships with them if required.

name: FIB-3 Afterburner
description: Although fusion reactors are becoming obsolete in primary impulse drives, they still have a place in secondary propulsion. The Fusion Intermix Booster project is attempting to use a fusion reactor to create thrust plasma, but then mix it with a small amount of antimatter to increase its temperature to 43keV. Heat and pressure stress induced structural integrity failures are still causing problems.

name: Complex-Mixture Reaction Mass
description: A complex mixture is a mixture that contains too many individual compounds as to allow separation by chromatographic methods. By expanding our methods to produce mixtures with optimal amounts of each compound, we can increase the potency of our fuel source, thus increasing sublight speeds.

name: Advanced Refining Techniques
description: Current demands are starting to outpace our ability to produce materials and in order to keep up with demands, more advanced refining techniques are required.

name: Multi-layered Planetary Shielding
description: Single layer planetary shields have been developed and proven safe. Now we can work on adapting techniques from starship scale shields for planetary use, such as multi-layered shields.

name: Nano Replicators
description: Complex replicator units can be installed across entire structures, allowing for improved access to tools, replacements, or upgrades.

name: High Energy Particle Weaponry
description: High-energy particle weaponry employs subatomic power. This technology bends the quantum forces that govern the very fabric of the universe, manipulating their innate characteristics to sear through matter. Unseen energy on a quantum level transforms into a destructive force on a grand scale.

name: Forge World
description: An entire world dedicated to the production of material.

name: Kemocite Refining
description: Kemocite is a mineral that is a multiphasic isotope of a radiolytic compound. Its highly unstable nature requires unique containment protocols be developed for usage in warheads.

unlock_details.description: Other: component | Building: Kemocite Mine 1 | Starbase Buildings: Refinery, Processing

name: Starbase Torpedo Pylon
description: Like most weapons, torpedo launchers have a limited firing arc. While fine for starships, starbases cannot manoeuvre to bring their weapons to bear. Traditionally this is overcome with a weapons grid spanning the starbases hull, but this wastes a lot of power. It is possible to design pylons which stick out from the station, allowing a smaller number of launchers to cover a wider area.

name: High Yield Fusion Explosives
description: Nuclear Explosives use a critical mass of fissile material to create a powerful explosion. By combining different catalysts we can improve the yield of the explosive substantially. This should allow for smaller, more powerful explosives to be utilised onboard vessels.

name: Exotic Matter Bombardment
description: The creation of short lived non-baryonic matter, that is not made of baryons, the subatomic particles, protons and neutrons of which ordinary matter is composed, allows their usage in bombardments to overwhelm enemy vessels.

name: Anti-Matter Bombardment
description: Breeder chambers allow for the rapid creation of unstable antimatter, which can be used to devastating effect against stationary planetary targets. When the antimatter contacts with regular matter, they both annihilate.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Bombardment Stance: Armageddon | Policy: orbital_bombardment_selective

name: Advanced Warhead Technologies
description: The initial forays into space weaponry showcase the requirement for new guided warheads to be designed.

name: Self-Replicating Mines
description: Our researchers have developed a new mine capable of replicating itself. Replicators transfer material to one another where it is needed in the field through networking. The neighbors of a detonated mine replace the lost mine, material however comes from at least 65 different mines. As stored material begins to run out, the mines have a zero-point extraction system for matter replenishment.

name: Transphasic Torpedo
description: The transphasic warhead is based on generating a destructive subspace compression pulse. Upon detonation the torpedo delivers the pulse in an asymmetric superposition of multiple phase states. Shields can only block one subcomponent of the pulse. The other subcomponents deliver the majority of the pulse to the target.

name: Variable-Yield Prefire Chamber
description: Variable yield is an option available on most modern weapons. It allows the operator to specify a weapon's yield, or explosive power, allowing a single design to be used in different combat situations.

name: Chroniton Torpedo
description: Chroniton torpedoes are new experimental ship-mounted weapons based on temporal science. These torpedoes are capable of passing through an enemy's shields due to the fact that they are in a constant state of temporal flux.

name: Parametric Chroniton Torpedo
description: Improving the parametric chroniton variation algorithms on our chroniton torpedoes should allow for improved shield piercing and armour penetration.

name: Mine Sweeper
description: Using various EM, optical and subspace sensors and scanners, we are now able to accurately detect and avoid mines by finding the energy-signatures and their subspace displacement of the mines.

name: Next Generation Transwarp Torpedo
description: By investigating the effects of applying a small transwarp field prior to the detonation of a torpedo our scientists have concluded that the weapons impact can be significantly increased.

name: Early Temporal Warhead
description: Early experiments into temporal mechanics offer numerous potential branches, with one interesting branch found with regards to phased explosives. By destabilising spacetime in a localised area, we can disrupt the very fabric of the universe, destroying whatever is in that location.

name: Temporal Weaponry
description: Early experiments with space age weaponry have enabled our researchers to develop a weapon that can punch quantum fractures into spacetime at the point of impact by using a condensed beam of chroniton radiation. This weapon can cause targets to fall slightly out of phase, resulting in damage to the systems and hull of the target.

name: Temporal Warheads
description: This torpedo warhead compensates for its slow movement by randomly phasing in and out of our spacetime reference before reaching its intended target and detonating with intense radiation, offering improved capabilities against shielded targets.

name: Variance Temporal Warhead
description: Improvements to the controlled flux variance result in a powerful projectile capable of phasing in and out of spacetime before reaching its target and detonating.

name: Temporal Flux Warhead
description: Experiments with controlling flux variations at random intervals have resulted in this powerful form of targeted projectile. Although capable of being shot down while traveling to its intended target, it compensates for these disadvantages by randomly phasing in and out of our spacetime reference before reaching its intended target and detonating with intense radiation.

name: Magnetometric Charge
description: It has been decided to improve our tactical options by developing a new weapon: a torpedo-style, variable-yield explosive charge. A suitable explosive was assimilated from species 658, propulsion system from species 337. Records indicate that 89% of species encountered use a metallic substance in their vessel's hull, this will be exploited for the guidance mechanism.

name: Magnetometric Guided Charge
description: It has been decided to improve our tactical options by developing a new weapon: a torpedo-style, variable-yield explosive charge. A suitable explosive was assimilated from species 658, propulsion system from species 337. Records indicate that 89% of species encountered use a metallic substance in their vessel's hull, this will be exploited for the guidance mechanism.

name: Interspatial Guided Charge
description: Incremental improvements have boosted the offensive power of guided charges, but the guidance system is inadequate. It is possible for vessels to evade magnetometric guidance systems by either projecting false ferrous signatures away from the vessel or using certain shield modulations. A vessel's gravimetric and subspace distortions are harder to mask, making them more robust features to track.

name: Hyper-Interspatial Guided Charge
description: Of little importance to us, simulations into new explosive devices have been proceeding slowly. The latest designs to emerge might be of use in guided charge technology. Graviton implosion fusion devices have a theoretical yield a factor of 1.7463 greater than the current charge warhead. Creating testing ranges and manufacturing facilities will reveal if their practical yield makes them viable.

name: Neural Interlink Guided Charge
description: We have concluded that physical feature guidance systems have insufficient efficacy. It has been decided that an active guidance system will be designed to replace them. The system will link the charge to the hive mind, allowing a network of drones to directly control it. This will render most countermeasures obsolete and improve the charge's predictive movement.

name: Triaxiliation-Modified Guided Charge
description: Anti-torpedo point defence weapon systems have experienced varying success against our guided charges. Charges should be reinforced with additional defensive force field generators to maintain our combat effectiveness. It might be possible to set our guided charges defensive force fields to a triaxilating modulation to increase their survivability.

name: Early Polaron Torpedo
description: Polarons are a quasiparticle with an unexpected quality: they can partially penetrate shields. In the initial testing environment, enriching the warheads with different subatomic particles results in different effects.

name: Polaron Torpedo
description: Polarons are a quasiparticle with an unexpected quality: they can partially penetrate shields. This is a by-product of the polaron's interaction with the graviton layers in the shield. These torpedoes are capable of piercing the shields of enemy ships and damage vital ship systems, such as engines, weapons, or life support.

name: Muon Enriched Polaron Torpedo
description: Enriching the warhead of polaron torpedoes with unstable muon subatomic particles increases the potency of the warhead substantially.

name: Chronometric Shifted Polaron Torpedo
description: Enriching the warhead of polaron torpedoes with unstable chroniton particles shifts the torpedo slightly out of phase with our universe, allowing for increased penetration of objects and fields.

name: Advanced Polaron Warhead Technology
description: Polarons are a quasiparticle with an unexpected quality: they can partially penetrate shields. In the initial testing environment enriching the warheads with different subatomic particles results in different effects.

name: Heavy Polaron Torpedo
description: Interlaced negative mass particles and polarons result in highly unstable, but effective, shield penetrating blast.

name: Rapid Polaron Torpedo Launcher
description: A specialised, highly manoeuvrable torpedo can be developed to destroy more agile enemy vessels. Due to the unique destructive methodology of polaron torpedoes, they must use a two-stage detonation warhead, which is not effective in this situation. Using a conventional explosive booster in the warhead's first stage will make it effective again, at the cost of a small amount of firepower.

name: Quasi-Interacting Heavy Polaron Torpedo
description: Simulations have been made to test exotic matter as a transfer medium. Using certain negative mass particles for the transfer medium will create an effect whereby the polaron can pass through shields relatively unhindered. Unfortunately, the polaron will not fully interact with the hull of the enemy ship which will reduce its damage potential, but we still expect a net increase in damage.

name: Rapid Ti-polaron decay Torpedo
description: Exotic matter experiments have yielded the 'Ti' particle, a new type of artificial exotic particle. If a suitable Ti particle generator can be built, they can be used in our torpedoes. This will allow us to remove the conventional explosive booster from the warhead and use the saved space to fit additional capacitors, increasing yield.

name: Resonance Torpedo
description: These warheads resonate at such high frequencies at the quantum level, and with such intensity, that shields are virtually useless against them. Torpedoes equipped with these warheads would make for very effective shield draining weapons.

name: Harmonic Resonance Torpedo
description: Resonance phenomena occur with all types of vibrations or waves. Resonant systems can determine the harmonic resonance of an object and recalibrate our warheads to a similar frequency, allowing for large amounts of atomic destruction as the natural resonance of an object is disrupted.

name: Calabi-Yau Manifold Torpedo
description: Calabi Yau manifolds are shapes that satisfy the requirement of space for the six unseen spatial dimensions of string theory, which may be smaller than our currently observable lengths. By manipulating these manifolds, we can increase the energy throughput and storage by a large factor, which increases the estimated warhead yield substantially.

name: Hyper-Harmonics Torpedo
description: In ultra-high frequency higher harmonic states, the properties of a material react subtly differently to harmonic disruption at a subatomic level which can be manipulated to disrupt the cohesion of an object. By combining new wave oscillation technology with the quantum resonance charges, our vessels can emit a much higher frequency blast using the same energy as before.

name: Quantum Torpedo
description: The quantum torpedo utilises a zero-point energy reaction to create a large isoton explosion.

name: Armor Penetration Quantum Torpedo
description: Extending, expanding and manipulating the Calabi-Yau manifold, the Quantum Torpedo can phase in and out of existence in the brief nanoseconds before the manifold collapses. This allows the Torpedo to pierce the armor and the hull of some ships and explode within, drastically increasing the potential damage.

name: Shield Damage Quantum Torpedo
description: Using a bio-neural gel processor and Thoron shielding, the powerful Quantum torpedo becomes even more accurate, deadlier and harder to destroy in flight, while causing significant damage to shields.

name: Intersecting Geometries Quantum Torpedo
description: By twisting the Calabi-Yau manifold into even more complex geometries, different parts of the quantum torpedo warhead can be made to exist at multiple points in space simultaneously. The effect is a highly focused explosion channelled into a cone, that inflicts enormous damage along its path. Not even the toughest armour and hull materials can resist.

name: Interlacing Fields Quantum Torpedo
description: These torpedoes weaponise the warp field passed to them at launch. Small and thin, but relatively long warp coils are placed around the warhead. This generates an intense shift in the torpedo's warp field, twisting it in upon itself in front of the torpedo, behind the targets shield. Where the field now interlaces with itself, a small, momentary subspace tear forms, directly damaging the hull.

name: Nuclear Torpedo
description: Nuclear torpedoes use fissile material to create a powerful explosion. This explosive can be used as a warhead and can be put on top a missile and loaded and fired at a target.

name: Advanced Space Ballistics
description: There are a range of improvements that can be made to make the existing spatial torpedo design more effective. Improved blast shields will channel more of the explosion towards the front of the torpedo. With our increased expertise in spaceborne sensors, scientists have devised an ECM suite that will make the torpedo harder to track and counteract.

name: Perfected Spatial Torpedo
description: The final step into spatial explosive warheads, this torpedo uses a heavy antimatter reaction to create hull busting torpedoes. Shielding, however, is still an issue for spatial torpedoes, with their effectiveness being extremely limited against them.

name: Deep Strike Advanced Torpedoes
description: A prototype, extreme-range, high-yield torpedo. Designed for bombarding targets from a safe distance, moderate tracking capability was added to help reduce the inaccuracy inherent to projectiles travelling large distances. Due to our engineer's inexperience with this type of weapon, photon launchers adapted to fire 'Deep Strike' torpedoes will suffer long reload times.

name: Principles of Antimatter Warhead Weaponry
description: An antimatter weapon was a device using antimatter as a power source, as a propellant, or as an explosive, in the case of the theoretical photon torpedo.

name: Anti-Matter Weaponry
description: Warp cores, a common reactor for powering starships and their warp drives, use a controlled matter/antimatter reaction to generate energy. This means that anti-matter creation, storage, and manipulation technologies and infrastructure are already well established. They can be easily weaponized, leading to a new breed of variable-yield, high-potential warheads.

name: Photon Torpedo
description: Continued work on creating specialised components has drastically cut the power requirement and freed up a lot of internal space. Two things can now be done with the design: the space can be used to fit a significantly larger warhead and higher capacity energy reserve, or we can design a smaller case with a high-mobility thruster system to create a shorter-range homing torpedo.

name: Type-3 Photon Torpedo
description: Following the certification of the initial design, there was a desire to explore the potential of this weapon class. Several research labs were instructed to pursue independent branches of photon torpedo design. Now that the program has produced several torpedo variations, it is felt that the time has come to take the most useful parts from each and unify them into a single generalised weapon.

name: Type-4 Photon Torpedo
description: New antimatter containment technology might allow an interlacing pattern of EM bubbles to be formed, each bubble containing either matter or antimatter. Warhead detonation is achieved by shutting down the EM field, removing the separation between the reactants.

name: Type-5 Photon Torpedo
description: High-strength, low-density materials have made some promising advances recently. We should assign a torpedo research team to investigate their suitability for use in torpedo casings. Hopefully a stronger, lighter case can be developed, allowing the warhead to be enlarged and the launch velocity increased.

name: Advanced Photon Warhead Technology
description: Upgrades to manifold technology and launch technology have granted us two avenues to go down. Which should we specialise in?

name: Rapid Fire Photon Torpedo
description: Photon torpedoes can be developed according to two philosophies: 'hit harder' or 'hit more often'. By adopting the 'hit more often' philosophy, we can develop launchers capable of rapidly firing light torpedoes. These torpedoes will have reduced destructive power and range compared to current designs but have increased accuracy and tracking capability.

name: High-Yield Photon Torpedo
description: Photon torpedoes can be developed according to two philosophies: 'hit harder' or 'hit more often'. By adopting the 'hit harder' philosophy we can develop torpedo launchers capable of firing heavier torpedoes with increased range. These will take more power to operate and have a much slower fire rate than standard torpedoes. Their size will also reduce their accuracy and tracking capability.

name: Rapid Fire Photon Mk. XXV Torpedo
description: Greater availability of warp plasma rated composite materials means they can be used in the construction of photon torpedo cases and their launchers, providing two advantages. The launchers can recharge faster, and a small amount of warp plasma can be mixed into the gas propellant, increasing its expansion rate. These launchers can fire higher yield light torpedoes without sacrificing velocity.

name: Variable-Yield Class-12 Photon Warhead
description: Advances in multiphasic technology have led to prototype multiphasic warheads. Instead of using EM bubbles, the matter is phased so that it can occupy the same space as the antimatter, without actually touching. To detonate, they are brought back into phase allowing a larger payload in a small package.

name: Early Photonic Torpedo
description: Early photonic torpedoes are the next step in antimatter warhead torpedo designs. They feature a more potent warhead than spatial torpedoes, and launch speeds can be increased due to lower mass requirements.

name: Fusion Warhead
description: Nuclear fusion is a reaction in which two or more atomic nuclei come close enough to form one or more different atomic nuclei and subatomic particles with the difference in mass between the reactants and products manifesting as the release of large amounts of energy, ideal for warheads for our vessels.

name: Advanced Thermonuclear Warfare
description: The basics of intersystem warfare at vast speeds require new tracking technology and larger yields. Loading space missiles with fusion warheads far beyond what would be used on a planetary scale enables our forces to have a weapon capable of hurting the enemy.

name: Fusion Missile Battery
description: These space missiles are armed with fusion warheads which deliver a nuclear payload to their targets. Loading them in batteries allows for volleys of these missiles to be fired simultaneously.

name: Hydrogen Nova Missile Battery
description: Large space missiles that utilise the same type of hydrogen reactions that occur in the centre of a solar body. These missiles can be loaded into batteries and fired in volleys to increase destructive payload.

name: Pion Torpedo
description: Matter/Antimatter reactions are used to generate meson decay reactions, which can be applied as a radioactive source against desired targets.

name: Kaon Torpedo
description: Kaon particles are formed when atomic nuclei collide with other highly charged subatomic particles. They have no electric charge and have about half the mass of a proton. This energy release gives the torpedo its destructive power.

name: Principles of Plasma Warhead Weaponry
description: A plasma weapon is a type of direct energy particle weapon that used plasma as a means of inflicting damage to the target.

name: Plasma Torpedo
description: These torpedoes utilise warp plasma in their warheads. The plasma is extremely difficult to contain in such a small space frame, however, which leads to rapid decay of the torpedo casing once the weapon is fired. Due to this fact, plasma torpedoes have virtually zero tracking capability, extremely short ranges, and consume significant amounts of ship energy stores to utilise.

name: Sheathed Plasma Torpedo
description: An antimatter sheath around the plasma torpedo can allow the torpedo to maintain stability and cohesion for longer than previously recorded, which results in an increased payload delivered to the target.

name: Advanced Plasma Explosive Weaponry
description: With some of the difficulties of containing plasma now resolved, new technologies are emerging which can take our plasma-based explosives down certain paths. We can aim for a raw increased damage output or improving its effectiveness against shields.

name: Phased Plasma Torpedo
description: These torpedoes utilise a phase inverter to alter the state of the torpedo's shielding to match that of the target. Theoretically speaking, this should allow the torpedoes increased shield-penetrating efficiency.

name: Enriched Plasma Torpedo
description: With increase torpedo case and containment shielding, we can now increase the plasma yield of our torpedoes, thereby increasing the damage output of our torpedoes.

name: Charged Plasma Torpedo
description: The Charged Plasma Torpedo loads a somewhat higher payload of warp plasma, but requires more energy to contain the plasma while the torpedoes are in their tubes.

name: Polarity-Charged Plasma Torpedo
description: The polarity charged Plasma Torpedo loads a higher payload of warp plasma, but requires more energy to contain the plasma while the torpedoes are in their tubes.

name: InterPhased Plasma Torpedo
description: By combining a cloaking device and a molecular phase inverter, the molecular structure of these torpedoes are altered upon launch so as to be able to pass through energy and even matter. There's no stopping these babies.

name: Multi-Phased Plasma Torpedo
description: Expanding upon previous iterations of phased torpedo technology, the warhead and the catalyst onboard these torpedos can be kept in separate phased instances, only combining once detonation is required. As both warhead and catalyst share the same space but in different phases the resulting explosion can be increased by an order of magnitude.

name: Radon Plasma Warhead
description: These torpedoes utilise Radon plasma instead of Noble Gas plasma. It offers a slightly greater yield without losing the slow degradation of the containment field. Thus the benefit of a small window for tracking is maintained.

name: Noble Gas Plasma Torpedo
description: Noble gas provides a somewhat less volatile plasma than warp plasma, leading to a slightly longer housing period before the plasma erodes the containment shielding and torpedo casing. This means that we will have a slight window of opportunity for tracking capability.

name: Warp Plasma Torpedo
description: Warp Plasma Torpedoes utilise warp drive plasma as the weapon's armament, requiring vast amounts of ships energy reserves to fire but causing significant shield and hull damage. The weapons range is severely limited however, which means that it is only effective at close quarters combat.

name: Static Warp Plasma Torpedo
description: Containing the warp plasma torpedo in a static warp shell decreases the rate of cohesion lost over time, thus allowing for a much more effective warp plasma torpedo.

name: Kemocite Torpedo
description: Kemocite is a mineral that is a multiphasic isotope of a radiolytic compound. Its highly unstable nature requires unique containment protocols be developed for usage in warheads.

name: Sarium Torpedo
description: Sarium krellide is a material which stored large amounts of energy and which is usually used in power cells or explosives.

name: Anicium Torpedo
description: Early torpedo research has led us down the path of an Anicium torpedo. Projections suggest that combining Anicium and a Yurium catalyst will yield an explosive so powerful that it could even disrupt subspace rifts.

name: Bilitrium Torpedo
description: Bilitrium is a rare, crystalline element that can be an incredibly powerful source of energy when combined with an antimatter converter. The development of antimatter breeders and containment chambers for the two unmixed components is of vital importance.

name: Trilithium Torpedo
description: Chemical synthesis has led to the creation of a compound named trilithium, an explosive of great power. Acting as an inhibitor of nuclear reactions, such as the fusion processes within the interior of stars, even a small amount of trilithium is potentially enough to halt fusion in a star, resulting in a quantum implosion. This raw power in torpedo form will be a deadly addition to our arsenal.

name: Dicobalt Charge
description: Dicobalt has an atomic mass twice that of regular cobalt, with a multiplicative effect on the explosive potential. It is, however, unstable and requires specialised equipment to be developed in order to weaponise it.

name: Tricobalt Explosives
description: Tricobalt is a heavy, volatile element, that is an effective explosive material. This variety and effectiveness allows tricobalt to be utilised in many forms of explosives.

name: Tricobalt Warhead
description: Tricobalt is a new type of explosive that could be used as anything between a small anti-personnel explosive to weapons of mass destruction to destroy large installations, such as space stations. Compared to dicobalt, the thermokinetic explosion yield of tricobalt is measured in tons or by the amount of subspace distortion they produced, in cochranes.

name: Tricobalt Torpedo
description: When properly detonated, tricobalt warheads deliver an extremely high amount of explosive energy. Due to the difficulty of directing and concentrating these explosions, it has only been used in mining applications. Taking advantage of gravitropic fields and inertial dampers, we might be able to create effective warheads.

name: Tricobalt Railgun
description: Utilising ultra-high energy rails, we can launch tricobalt slugs at enemy vessels at high speeds which not only have explosive energy from the tricobalt but retain a massive amount of kinetic energy too.

name: Pulse Wave Torpedo
description: Pulse wave technology has increased to the point where its use in torpedo weaponry could be considered. The variable detonation pulses can cause aftershocks upon targets that it has hit.

name: Gravimetric Torpedo
description: Photon torpedoes outfitted with gravimetric charges emit a complex phase variance of gravitons to create a gravimetric distortion capable of tearing starships apart.

name: Gravity-Shear Torpedo
description: These torpedoes utilise changes in gravity and inertial dampening fields to enhance their targeting, explosion direction, and force of impact, further enhancing destructive power but also greatly increasing accuracy and tracking.

name: Gravity-Maelstrom Torpedo
description: By detonating ultra-heavy tricobalt devices at specific frequencies, we can create large gravity maelstroms that will shear and damage enemy vessels, effectively tearing them apart from the inside out.

name: Compact Spatial Charge
description: Spatial charges (or subspatial charges, when fired into subspace) are variable-yield explosive devices. Their variable yield means that mining charges can be quite easily jury-rigged into military grade explosives.

name: Thermokinetic Warhead
description: The rapid transferal of kinetic energy into thermal energy is quite well understood, but with the advent of superluminal travel and combat the previous generation has been severely lacking. Improvements to our warheads can utilise the kinetic energy of an impact to further improve yield.

name: Directed Concussive Charge
description: Part of the problem of early torpedoes is the redirection of much of the blast away from the target. The advent of new directed charges can utilise that energy and push it towards the target, rather than away.

name: Nucleonic Charge
description: Nucleonic particles are substances found within polaric fields. They are composed of highly charged particles, primarily ferric ions, as well as other unidentifiable elements. They are also extremely magnetic, causing them to be drawn and adhere to metal surfaces. By utilising them within our warheads, we can ensure the charges more easily track the hulls of enemy vessels.

name: Red Matter Charge
description: Red matter is an artificial substance manufactured from decalithium, a form of highly refined Dilithium crystal. On impact it has been theorised to cause ruptures to space resulting in black holes. However in small quantities it makes a dangerous and poweful explosive.

name: Rapid Fire Photon Mk. XXX Torpedo
description: Refinements in the launching mechanisms of the Mk.XXV allow for a faster reload speed reducing a fraction of a second from the time it takes to prepare and launch a torpedo at an enemy vessel.

name: Multi-Phased Class-14 Photon Warhead
description: Greater availability of warp plasma rated composite materials means they can be used in the construction of photon torpedo cases and their launchers, providing two advantages. The launchers can recharge faster, and a small amount of warp plasma can be mixed into the gas propellant, increasing its expansion rate. These launchers can fire higher yield light torpedoes without sacrificing velocity.

name: Experimental Vector Quantum Torpedo
description: Prior efforts to focus the internal targeting sensors within the warhead has previously been hampered by the thin warp field generated by the torpedo. Advances in shielding have allowed engineers to increase the accuracy and penetration of the warhead.

name: Experimental Fields Quantum Torpedo
description: Further refinement to the fields generated by the warhead increases the potensy of the weapon yield using state of the art technicques developed as part of ongoing work into warp drive.

name: Decalithium-Modified Guided Charge
description: We have concluded that upgrading the quality of Dilithium at the core of our weaponary will provide increases to damage in the event that offensive action is required.

name: Decalithium Torpedo
description: Decalithium is a highly rare isotope and element, although extremely rare it possesses a tenfold increase over basic lithium and an explosion that matches.

name: Patrol Frigate Blueprints
description: Patrol frigates are our first line of defense against spacefaring enemies. Although they are equipped with relatively weak armaments, they are rather mobile and are quite cheap and quick to produce.

name: Destroyer Blueprints
description: Significantly larger than the patrol frigate, the destroyer is a very cheap and effective frontline ship that is capable of being quickly produced while fielding tons of offensive capabilities for its price. However, a major increase in maintenance costs makes them hard to sustain in peace times.

name: Cruiser Blueprints
description: A significant advancement in starship design, the cruiser's impressive size is matched by its array of larger scale weapons and additional defensive systems. While it can take a beating on the battlefield, its reduced manoeuvrability can leave it vulnerable to swarms of smaller vessels.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Country Limit: Exploration Cruiser Limit | Ship Types: Sovereign, Cruiser

name: Advanced Starship Construction
description: State-of-the-art orbital construction techniques result in starships of unrivaled capabilities and spaceports the size of major planetside cities.

name: Battlecruiser Blueprints
description: Battlecruisers field the largest torpedo batteries of any known ship design. Their strong salvoes are able to obliterate smaller vessels in an instant, but high maintenance and weak defensive systems limit their ability to serve as the core for a fleet.

name: Battleship Blueprints
description: The battleship is one of the the largest vessels to serve in the navy of any empire. Its enormous defensive and support capabilities makes it fearsome opponents in combat, while her upgraded fuel storage allows it to reach directly into every distant system.

name: Superior Starship Construction
description: The advances in construction techniques allows for massive installations and vessels that are like cities floating in space. They can support a crew of thousands and are often equipped with firepower rivaling that of a fleet.

name: Heavy Raider Blueprints
description: 'If you get into a fight, strike first, and strike hard!' This advice serves as the inspiration for the design behind the heavy raider. Able to quickly jump to high warp speeds, ships of this class carry impressive offensive capabilities despite their small size and high manoeuvrability.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Types: Strike, Ship

name: Next-Level Starship Construction
description: Plans for immense starships and starbases capable of holding its own against several strike fleets are now being drawn up.

name: Next-Level Destroyer Prototype
description: Recent developments in starship construction allows for far more robust and modular designs, with simplified production lines and scalable components that can fit a wide range of starships. Research and development centres can now plan for highly specialised ships that are best suited for the task at hand.

name: Proxima Class Experimental Battleship
description: The Proxima-class is a federation battleship and is extremely heavily armed.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Type: Heavy Cruiser Proxima

name: Proxima Class Refit Blueprints
description: Upgrades to the Proxima Class further enhance its reputation. It is considered to be a battleship and is extremely heavily armed.

name: NX Discovery Plans
description: The ships of the Discovery-class are among those which receive a number of ugrades as a result of Earth rapid technological advances.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Type: Frigate Discovery

name: NX Beta Blueprints
description: The NX-Beta was one of three test vehicles, along with the NX-Alpha and NX-Delta, used by Starfleet's NX Project to test and refine the warp 5 engine designed by Henry Archer.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Type: Attack Wing Nx Beta

name: Long Range Slipstream Prototype
description: The quantum slipstream drive (also informally called quantum drive or slipstream drive) is an advanced form of propulsion technology which has the capability of exceeding a starship's maximum warp factor by an unprecedented degree.

unlock_details.description: Other: ship | Ship Type: Explorer Dauntless

name: Getting from here to there
description: The NX Project, also known as the NX Program or NX Test Program, is Starfleet's effort to develop a starship using the engine designed by the Warp Five program.

name: Columbia Class Refit
description: The Columbia-class was born out of the existing, and proven, NX-class design, and included retrofitted ships such as Enterprise and USS Endeavour. In 2156, Enterprise was the first vessel to receive the upgraded spaceframe. It was named, at the insistence of Admiral Jonathan Archer.

name: Metaphasic Radiation Bombardment
description: The ability to bombard a planet with concentrated Metaphasic Radiation that would start a thermolytic reaction, the radiation of which to be collected by a collector or left to destroy the planet.

name: Metaphasic Radiation Core
description: Harnessing the power of the Metaphasic Radiation allows for the creation of a powerful reactor core.

name: Bio Propulsion Unit
description: Using chemical processes produced naturally by the bioships Undine vessels are able to prepel themselves along at sub warp speeds.

name: Bio Propulsion Array
description: Using chemical processes produced naturally by the bioships Undine vessels are able to prepel themselves along at sub warp speeds.

name: Bio Propulsion Impulse Array
description: Using chemical processes produced naturally by the bioships Undine vessels are able to prepel themselves along at sub warp speeds.

description: Using chemical processes produced naturally by the bioships Undine vessels are able to prepel themselves along at sub warp speeds.

description: Using chemical processes produced naturally by the bioships Undine vessels are able to prepel themselves along at sub warp speeds.

name: Bio Propulsion High-Gain Impulse Array

description: Using chemical processes produced naturally by the bioships Undine vessels are able to prepel themselves along at sub warp speeds.

name: Bio Propulsion Hyper-Impulse Array
description: Using chemical processes produced naturally by the bioships Undine vessels are able to prepel themselves along at sub warp speeds.

name: Xindi Kemocite Overload Beam
description: Super heated charged Kemocite particles fired through an intense focusing beam can create a weapon of unrivalled power and destruction.

name: Metal Extraction Technology
description: Nanites released into the crust and mantle of a planet can mine rich deposits from under the surface of the world rapidly.

name: Klingon Great Houses
description: The Klingon Great Houses drive the empire forward and ensure that the Klingon Empire is constantly moving a challenge.

unlock_details.description: Building: Penal Capital Rure 2 | Megastructure: Kdf Great House

name: Production Ready Dilithium incubator
description: The Xaheans have productionised their Dilithium Incubator, which will provide a positive boost to our Dilithium production by recrystallising dilithium.

name: Section 31 Heavy Escort
description: Section 31 has access to the latest and best technology within Starfleet and the Nimrod Class reflects these design choices. Providing Section 31 with a fast and deadly ship.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship: Nimrod Class | Country Limit: Nimrod Limit | Ship Type: Stealth Escort Nimrod

name: Division 14
description: Division 14, also known as D-14, is a specialised Starfleet division that handles mysterious science- or medical-related problems afflicting its personnel.

name: Achilles Class Blueprints
description: The Achilles-class starship is a strategic heavy cruiser developed by the Federation in response to large cruisers owned by rival galactic powers.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship: Achilles Class | Ship Type: Heavy Cruiser Achilles

name: Alternate Universe Constitution Class
description: Tech dervived from a mysterious ship pulled from another timeline.

unlock_details.description: TECH_UNLOCK_SHIP_FED_KELVINCON_TITLE | Country Limit: Heavy Cruiser Kelvin Constitution Limit | Ship Type: Heavy Cruiser Kelvin Constitution

name: Pegasus Class Refit
description: A test bed class for a number of experimental technologies.

name: Starbase Construction
description: The Starbase is a planet's foothold in space, a centre for trade and commerce, as well as home base for military and civilian vessels.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Starbase: Starbase Level I | Megastructure: Terok Nor | Ship Types: Outpost, Starport, Fe Outpost, Member World Shipyard | Starbase Building: Solar Battery | Starbase Modules: Panel Network, Solar Panel Network

name: Perfected Starbase Construction Methods
description: Designed as the ultimate in Starbase design, this new base will become a castle and planet in the sky, providing the last line of defense for any home system. Many would now consider this facility as the true capital of our civilization.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Starbase: Starbase Level V | Country Limit: Castle Limit | Ship Type: Castle

name: Discover a future worth fighting for
description: As a reward for our efforts in defeating the Andromedan invaders we have been gifted the designs, but not the advanced technology of the ships that came to our aid to defend the future.

name: Texas Class Automation
description: Designed to be the next stage in the automatic ship design process, capable of going into dangerous situations and reacting faster than crewed ships.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship: Texas Class | Country Limit: Hero Ship Texas Limit | Ship Types: Hero Ship Texas, Heavy Escort Texas

name: Last Line of Defense
description: The Deimos-class dedicated to the Starfleet Intelligence department Section 31. It is equipped with sophisticated stealth equipment and enables attacks and infiltration from the shadows.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship: Deimos Class | Ship Type: Stealth Escort Deimos

name: A Quality of Mercy
description: The Farragut type consists of a saucer section without a separate engineering section. The main deflector and nacelle pylons are mounted directly on the ventral surface of the saucer. This class has a crew complement of approximately four hundred. It is equipped with phasers and deflector shields, and has a maximum speed of warp 9.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship: Farragut Class | Ship Type: Mmv Farragut

name: Krause Inspired Design Aesthetics
description: Inspired by the brilliant mind of Starfleet design consultant Admiral Krause, this design plays a crucial role in complimenting the existing ships within the fleet.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship: Shangri-La Class | Ship Type: Heavy Cruiser Shangri La

name: Mariposas Medical Frontier
description: The Mariposas are a movement dedicated to providing medical care to those in need. It was founded on Earth by Doctor Teresa Ramirez and Cristbal Rios.

name: The New Next Generation
description: Starfleet Corp of Engineering specialist McMahan has created a series of unique designs, which deserved a longer run but provided fantastic entertainment.

name: Solar Forming
description: The power to manipulate stellar matter for power or destruction.

name: Annoraxian Timeship designs
description: Krenim weapon ship is a warship of the Krenim Imperium capable of erasing civilisations from history. Its design and construction is spearheaded by Annorax, a military temporal scientist.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship: Annoraxian Timeship | Country Limit: Ship Annorax Limit | Ship Type: Ship Annorax

name: Industrial Mining
description: The basic industrial infrastructure that is required to become a spacefaring civilisation.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Mining Network 1, Building Basic Mine | Ship Type: Station

name: Offworld Construction
description: Our engineers continue to come up with new and exciting designs, that are ready to take shape outside of our solar system. We should continue to expand upon these projects to offworld areas, as the more we build, the more we learn.

name: Starship Class Specialisation Program
description: During the early days of space exploration, we could get away with using a limited number of starship design patterns. We now have more experience with living in space, and our technology has improved in some significant ways. In order to make the most of this new technology and to ensure our fleets are as capable as they can be, we must consider choosing an area of starship design to focus on.

name: Tactical Starship Construction Program
description: In times of conflict, we need ships specifically designed to engage the enemy. These ships are outfitted with additional tactical slots to best outperform our enemies in offensive abilities.

name: Engineering Starship Construction Program
description: These ships are designed to survive! Additional engineering stations and modules on our ships allow us to outfit our ships with extra armor and hull plating as well as shield generators, thus improving our chances of survival in a fight.

name: Support Starship Construction Program
description: No fleet can survive without proper support vessels. Ships of this specialisation are designed with scientific countermeasures and evasion in mind.

name: Advanced Destroyer Construction Methods
description: Improvements upon the cheaper frontline destroyers will allow them to be quickly produced whilst maintaining the newest and most up to date technology. Maintenance costs remain high; however, the offensive capacity outweighs the size.

name: Advanced Destroyer Construction Methods
description: Improvements upon the cheaper frontline destroyers will allow them to be quickly produced whilst maintaining the newest and most up to date technology. Maintenance costs remain high; however, the offensive capacity outweighs the size.

name: Advanced Destroyer Construction Methods
description: Improvements upon the cheaper frontline destroyers will allow them to be quickly produced whilst maintaining the newest and most up to date technology. Maintenance costs remain high; however, the offensive capacity outweighs the size.

name: Civilian Fleet
description: Research into improvements for our civilian vessels is just as important as our military. Improvements to construction and science ships can increase our expansion rate.

name: Advanced Cruiser Construction Methods
description: Advances in construction technology allow our Cruisers to be built with more redundancy and with the most up to date technology onboard.

name: Advanced Cruiser Construction Methods
description: Advances in construction technology allow our Cruisers to be built with more redundancy and with the most up to date technology onboard.

description: Advances in construction technology allow our Cruisers to be built with more redundancy and with the most up to date technology onboard.

name: Advanced Battlecruiser Construction Methods
description: Advances in construction technology allow our Battlecruisers to be built with more redundancy and with the most up to date technology onboard. They remain relatively fragile whilst packing a large array of offensive weaponry.

name: Advanced Battlecruiser Construction Methods
description: Advances in construction technology allow our Battlecruisers to be built with more redundancy and with the most up to date technology onboard. They remain relatively fragile whilst packing a large array of offensive weaponry.

name: Advanced Battlecruiser Construction Methods
description: Advances in construction technology allow our Battlecruisers to be built with more redundancy and with the most up to date technology onboard. They remain relatively fragile whilst packing a large array of offensive weaponry.

name: Advanced Battleship Construction Methods
description: Advances in construction technology allows our Battleships to be built with more redundancy and with the most up to date technology onboard. They remain slow, but heavily armoured, whilst packing a large array of offensive weaponry.

name: Advanced Battleship Construction Methods
description: Advances in construction technology allows our Battleships to be built with more redundancy and with the most up to date technology onboard. They remain slow, but heavily armoured, whilst packing a large array of offensive weaponry.

description: Advances in construction technology allows our Battleships to be built with more redundancy and with the most up to date technology onboard. They remain slow, but heavily armoured, whilst packing a large array of offensive weaponry.

name: Advanced Heavy Raider Construction Methods
description: The construction of the heavy raider prototype has allowed advances with the construction methods used to create advanced heavy raiders.

name: Advanced Heavy Raider Construction Methods
description: The construction of the heavy raider prototype has allowed advances with the construction methods used to create advanced heavy raiders.

name: Advanced Heavy Raider Construction Methods
description: The construction of the heavy raider prototype has allowed advances with the construction methods used to create advanced heavy raiders.

name: Assault Cruiser Blueprints
description: The most advanced starship design the Milky Way has seen in a long time, assault cruisers are equipped with powerful forward spinal weapons, capable of obliterating opponents from afar while still fielding enough normal beam and torpedo weaponry to deal with other ships up close. Its high maintenance and cost make this ship class more of a luxury, however.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship Type: Assault Cruiser | Ship Types: Cruiser, Cannon

name: Eden in the Deep Heavens
description: Leaving fragile planetary bodies behind and roaming the stars that belong to us is a dream we have for millennia. The creation of vast vessels capable of housing entire populations of our people is almost within our grasp.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship Type: City Ship | Country Limit: War Limit | Ship Type: War

name: The Bite of the Predator
description: The new Ekoor Class ships will put us on an equal footing with those who are fooling enough to challenge the Union.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship: Ekoor Class | Ship Types: 01 Cruiser Kimal, 01 War Cruiser Ekoor

name: The Dark Jewels of the Union
description: They are created secretly by military engineers in order to create a powerful battleship and are known as dark jewels of the Cardassian fleets. They are heavily armed with phasers and protected by powerful shields allowing them to fight on the front line.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship: Kulinor Class  | Ship Type: 01 War Cruiser Letau

name: Supercarrier Blueprints
description: A vast symbol of the power of the power of our Empire. It is the will of our leaders that we create a vessel capable of destroying an entire fleet at once.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship Type: Flagship | Ship Types: Battleship, Sword Shrike, 01 Cruiser Kimal, 01 War Cruiser Ekoor, 01 Adv Cruiser Obsidian

name: Jem'Hadar Fleet Carrier Prototype
description: Requiring the largest vessels available to the Dominion, the fleet carrier design is a flagship and fleet command and control unit all in one. A single one of these vessels should be able to pacify most worlds.

name: Short-Range Jem'Hadar Fighter
description: Jem'Hadar fighters are lightly armed with polaron beams, though they have very short range and limited defences. The fighter is much more valuable than its crew.

unlock_details.description: Ship Type: Defense Dom 1 | Starbase Module: Bay Dom

name: Jem'Hadar Assault Craft
description: Jem'Hadar Assault Craft are armed with improved polaron beams and are very fast and maneuverable, and protected by armour. In large numbers, these fighters pose a threat to even capital ships.

name: Jem'Hadar Heavy Patrol Boat
description: These patrol boats are small and nimble with enhanced polaron weaponry and shielding. Their sturdy hulls allow these pursuit craft to take on small vessels one on one and pose a serious threat to larger vessels when in swarms.

name: Alpha Jem'Hadar Fighter
description: These Alpha Jem'Hadar fighters are heavy armed with long-range capability and strong hulls. Maneuverability is high, which renders it a threat to larger enemy vessels, especially in large numbers.

name: Transorbital Fighter Craft
description: Designed to operate with a base of operation close by, these transorbital fighters could be used to harass enemy ships.

unlock_details.description: Ship Type: Defense Generic 1 | Starbase Module: Bay

name: Miniaturised Warp Core
description: By miniaturising the warp core, we can install cores on our fighter craft. These deep-space fighters can then move rapidly and overwhelm enemy vessels.

name: Deep-Space Ready Fighter Craft
description: To counter the threat of enemy fighters and to ensure a deep strike capability, research into long-range fighter engagements is required. Solving the issues of logistics and endurance shall be one of the main priorities.

name: Dedicated Fighter Wing
description: Advances in fighter technology mean that the next step is well-equipped for both dogfighting and anti-capital operations, dedicated fighters that can pack a punch.

name: Short-Range Pursuit Craft
description: Designed to be launched from the surface or low orbit, these pursuit craft are short-ranged ships designed for defence.

unlock_details.description: Ship Type: Defense Car 1 | Starbase Module: Bay Car

name: Vystan Stealth Fighter
description: Small, stealthy fighters, these attack ships are designed to scout enemy activity without being caught; however, they are also equipped with weaponry in order to be used in fleet actions.

name: Hideki Assault Vessel
description: The Hideki-class attack ships, also referred to as Cardassian fighters, are a type of small warship with heavy weapons designed to operate in fleet environments.

unlock_details.description: Ship Types: 01 Weapons Platform Chintoka, 01 Cruiser Kimal

name: Advanced Pursuit Craft
description: Small and nimble with enhanced weaponry and shielding, these pursuit craft can take on small vessels one on one and pose a serious threat in large numbers.

name: The Versatility of the Probe
description: Efficient usage of limited resources results in a small, flexible, expendable package designed to seek out new resources for the Collective. Extolling the nature of the Collective where no individual is worth more than the whole.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship Type: Probe | Espionage Operation: Assimilate Ship | Ship Type: Probe

name: The Agility of the Cone
description: The simple, but effective, conical design of the Cone is ideal for a rapid scout vessel. Its hardened outer shell can be outfitted with multi-specialist systems that can easily be rotated into place.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship Type: Cone | Espionage Operation: Assimilate Ship | Ship Type: Scout

name: The Geometry of the Pyramid
description: Congruent sturdy shapes form the pinnacle of the Borg. The triangle being the strongest shape when pressed upon its apex. Strong angular forms allow for armoured sides, and sharp corners allow for extended weaponry.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship Type: Pyramid | Espionage Operation: Assimilate Ship | Ship Type: Pyramid

name: The Perfection of the Sphere
description: The Sphere embodies perfect simplicity. It can be described in one simple thought; every point is equidistant to its centre. It has infinite faces, each infinitely small, blending seamlessly to form a single surface. This mirrors the nature of the Collective; many voices, a single purpose. It has the smallest surface area to volume ratio of any 3D shape; we must emulate its perfect efficiency.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship Type: Sphere | Espionage Operation: Assimilate Ship | Ship Type: Sphere

name: The Intricacy of the Diamond
description: A Diamond is little more than a cube which has been tilted and stretched. Its profile can be superimposed over a sphere, to provide an armoured and weaponised exoframe. The inner sphere can then carry delicate, sensitive equipment in relative safety. Despite the deceptively fragile look of this intricate design, it will function well as a hive guardian and support vessel.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship Type: Diamond | Espionage Operation: Assimilate Ship | Ship Type: Diamond

name: The Solidity of the Cube
description: The Cube is another simple shape; twelve edges share a single length. It tessellates infinitely, growing in complexity, as does the Collective. The surface area of the cube is much higher than the sphere, and less vulnerable than the Diamond. Everything combines to make the cube an excellent shape for a heavy combat and assimilation focused vessel, uniting more worlds in Borg solidarity.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship Type: Cube | Bombardment Stance: Harvest 2 | Ship Type: Cube

name: A Resilient Cube
description: The Cube has proven to be an effective vessel design. However, species with a comparable level of combat technology pose a threat to it. To ensure their resistance is futile, a series of upgrades can be made to make the Cube more resilient, maximising its tactical efficiency function. Higher density exoplating covering a wider portion of the hull is the first adaption to be tested.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship Type: Tactical Cube | Ship Type: Tactical

name: Omega
description: Omega is perfection. The sheer power of this particle means that a single stable molecule is capable of generating the same power output as a warp core.

name: Unity of the Hive
description: Cubes and Tactical Cubes sufficiently handle most hostile encounters. We wish to handle species with comparable technology to us with the same efficacy as those who are less developed. The unity granted to us by the Hive will enable us to create an enormous scaled-up Cube, which will go unmatched in size, firepower, and durability.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship Type: Omega Cube | Country Limit: Super Cube Limit | Ship Type: Cube

name: Omega Scout Design
description: Utilising advances in boronite production and the stabilisation of Omega particles, the Collective's vessels can be upgraded with new Omega designs.

name: Omega Probe Design
description: Utilising advances in boronite production and the stabilisation of Omega particles, the Collective's vessels can be upgraded with new Omega designs.

name: Omega Diamond Design
description: Utilising advances in boronite production and the stabilisation of Omega particles, the Collective's vessels can be upgraded with new Omega designs.

description: Utilising advances in boronite production and the stabilisation of Omega particles, the Collective's vessels can be upgraded with new Omega designs.

name: Omega Sphere Design
description: Utilising advances in boronite production and the stabilisation of Omega particles, the Collective's vessels can be upgraded with new Omega designs.

name: Life among Death
description: The universe of non-fluidic space is alien to us, and our vessels require adaptation to be able to survive in the absence of fluid.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship: Bio-Ship | Ship Types: 01 Bio Scout, 01 Bio Frigate

name: Safety among the Alien
description: Adaptation of our living vessels to non-fluidic space allows larger and more potent designs to be created to ensure incursions into fluidic space are stopped.

unlock_details.description: Unlocks Ship: Bio-Warship | Ship Type: 01 Bio Ship

name: Advance Son'a Ship construction
description: The Son'a collector is a massive spacecraft designed by the Son'a to harvest metaphasic radiation from the rings of the planet Ba'ku.

name: Metaphasic Radiation Bombardment
description: The ability to bombard a planet with concentrated Metaphasic Radiation that would start a thermolytic reaction, the radiation of which to be collected by a collector or left to destroy the planet.

name: Metaphasic Radiation Collection
description: The technology to forcefully harvest the metaphasic radiation, entailing the use of a piece of equipment, known as an injector assembly to be launched from a specialty ship.

name: Starship Automation Protocols
description: Advances in AI and automation processes combined with the advanced operations of a starship allow for increased efficiency across the ship.

name: Xindi Weapon Ship
description: Based on technology that cannot be explained that seems to come from another century, the Xindi Probe weapons are ships of mass destruction.

unlock_details.description: Country Limit: Planet Killer Degra Limit | Ship Type: Planet Killer Degra

name: Kemocite Fuel Reactor
description: Fueled by the best quality Kemocite that the Xindi can produce the reactor is designed to power the most powerful of ships.
